191b4(rgyud 'grel): la dbang phyug u me re la gnas// bdag nyid srid pa'i 'ching ba'i zhags pas bcings// le la khu ba khrag dang rnam snang za// bya rog bya rgod bzhin du bdag nyid 'khol// le la gnas gsum skad cig gsum
191b5(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom// la la snying ga'i pad+ma 'khor lo 'chang // lA la hUM phaT zer zhing phreng ba 'grang // byol song rnams ni 'khrul pa rgyun mi 'chad// dbang dang dbang bskur mang po gsungs pa rnams// bla ma rnams la slob
191b6(rgyud 'grel): mas len par byed// de nas brtsims shing brtsams shing slob ma rnams la 'chang // dbang bskur gyi ni phyogs kyang ma mthong ngo // la las gser 'gyur rtsi ni lta byed pas// des ni khyim pa rnams ni dbul por
192a1(rgyud 'grel): byas// lha rnams kyis kyang mi bde ba la sbyar// nags la skyes pa'i rtswa dang shing rnams dang // shing lo me tog rnams kyis sgyid ma bstan// dus su bsam gtan 'jig rten
192a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams byed// des ni mchog gi thar pa mi shes so// cal col mang pos smras pas ci zhig bya// ji ltar smras pa de dag thams cad brdzun// gdams ngag pa rnams gsol po'i gnas lugs nyon// gang gis gsal
192a3(rgyud 'grel): bor thar pa grol bu rnyed// sems ni g.yo zhing myon pa lta bur thong // skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa gsum po rtogs par gyis// mgul rgyan dang ni phyag rgya ma lus thong // des ni mgon po ji ltar mthong byar 'gyur//
192a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa ni yi ge rnams la gtong // yi ge med pa de ni snying la ma chung ngo // grang mas ngag pa rnams nyon cig ngas ni bshad par bya// khams gsum bor nas dpal ldan theg pa che// dang po'i mgon po la ni drage
192a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mi dge med// ma lus khyab cing bde chen stong pa nyid// byed pa 'phrog pa rang nyid spyan ras gzigs// zad pa med cing gzhan du song ba med// de ni mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'o// bsam gtan gyis ni ting 'dzin

193b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpe dang bral// dpe bral nyid lnga 'dra mi gnas bla yi yul las 'das// rtag min chad min 'khro dang mya ngan 'das pa min// snang min snod min dngos dang dngos med skye med min// chos nyid gnyug ma ma yin blo las 'das

193b6(rgyud 'grel): med/ gdod nas lhan cig skyes pas gzhan nas btsal du med// sems nyid ming stong spros bral phyag rgya chen po ste// na mkha'i rang bzhin gdod nas ming stong yin dang mtshungs// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes mtshan ma'i
194a1(rgyud 'grel): spros dang bral// mkha' ltar kun la khyab cing 'pho dang 'gyur ba med// dus rnams kun tu stong zhing ye nas bdag med de// dran rtog mtshan ma med de smig rgyu'i chu bo ltar// ma bcings ma grol
194a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyug ma'i ngang las ma g.yos so// sems can thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i sprul pa lA// sprul pa'i ngo bo ye nas skye med chos kyi dbyings// bde sdug la sogs gnyis snang mtshan ma thams cad kyang // chos
194a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnyug ma phyag rgya chen po'i rol pa'o// rol pa nyid la bden med mi brtan 'a gyur ba'i phyir// gnas lugs stong pa'i rgya las nam yang ma 'das so// kha cig dbang bskur ba yis yongasu gdung bar byed//
194a4(rgyud 'grel): kha cig hU~M phaT zer zhing phreng ba yongs su bgrang // kha cig bshang gci khrag dang khu be sha rnams za// kha cig rtswa dang rlung gi rnal 'byor bsgom ste yongasu 'khrul/ e ma ho/ bla ma dem pas zin pas cig shos 'di ltar
194a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs// gang yang 'khrul pa yin phyir yang dag rtogs pa med// rtogs bya rtogs byed med pas phyogs ris mtha' dang bral// bral dang ma bral med pas mnyam nyid gnyug ma'i dang // 'di ltar rtogs nas nges par
194a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du dris med// sna tshogs chos skur gsal bso spong len sems mi 'byung // bsgom dang mi bsgom med cing mtshan mas gos pa med// snang dang mi snang yul la nam yang brten mi byed// bya dang byed pa'i sems
194b1(rgyud 'grel): med dmigs pa kun dang bral// re dang dogs pa'i sems med kun la zhen pa log/ bla mas bstan pas gnyug ma'i gnas lugs rtogs gyur na// dran rig sna tshogs chos kyi dbyings su rang brlag ste// rnam shes
194b2(rgyud 'grel): yul la mi gnas chags zhen kun brel bas// ma bcos gnyug ma'i dang du chos kun grol bar 'gyur// kun la ma chags nga rgyal la sogs dri ma bral// gus par ldan zhing dam pas yongs su zin pa dang // gang
194b3(rgyud 'grel): yang yid byed bral na dri med the tsom med// shes dang shes bya dag pas chos nyid mngon sum 'char// gnyug ma phyag rgya chen po rtogs par ma gyur na// rtag tu gnyis 'dzin dbang gis kun la zhen gyur byas// bsam
194b4(rgyud 'grel): rig rab ri bi sna tshogs rgyun du skye 'gyur zhing // ma nor don la mi gnas srid par 'khor zhing 'khyam// snyan glags bsnyen bkur kun la chags shing zhen pa dang // thos bsam go rtogs chen dang nyams myong bzang po dang //
194b5(rgyud 'grel): bsags sgrub byin brlab nus pa'i rtags byung bcos ma'i lam// don gyi dri ma yin phyir mkhas pas yid mi gtad// de nyid yid la byed cing gnyis mtha'i phyogs lhung na// 'khor bar 'khor zhing srid pa'i rtsa ba yin pa'i
194b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ kun gyi gzhi rtsa yid kyi ri bo gang yin ltos// bltas pas ma mthong yid dang bral na nges par grol// sems kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'di zhes med pas na// de la sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis su med// yod
195a1(rgyud 'grel): med cir yang mi rtog ma yengs dang la gzhag/ stong pa nyid dang skye med blo las 'das pa dang // mtha' bral la sogs grang yang yid la byed pa na// gnas lugs don la ma gnas
195a2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu yengs pa'o// stong dang mi stong rtsis med lhug pa'i dang la zhog/ gzhag dang mi gzhag med par rang dga' yan par thong // btang dang bzung ba'i sems med ro langs ji bzhin gyis// de nyid gnas lugs
195a3(rgyud 'grel): rig nas de'i ngang gnas na// gnyis snang mtshan ma'i bag chags myur du 'jig par 'gyur// rtogs pa'i dang la mi gnas mtshan mas g.yeng gyur na// gnyis snang mtshan ma'i bag chags ldog par ma 'gyur te/
195a4(rgyud 'grel): rab rib can gyi mig gi nang du shes gyur kyang // mig gi nang ma bying bar rab rib snang mi ldog/ gnas lugs yid la byed cing nyams bzhin pa dang // de nyid don la dmigs shing bsgoms na kol ba'i rgyu// mthun
195a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug rnams la chags sdang skye phyir 'ching ba'o// mi mthun rkyen ngan thams cad dngos grub dam pa ste// mi mthun rkyen gyis rnal 'byor nyams kyi gsal 'debs phyir// rkyen ngan mi spang de nyid shes pas de la sbyang //
195a6(rgyud 'grel): lngar skyong zhing nyams rtogs mthor 'byin spyod pa ste// gi ling drag la lcag gis bskul ba ji bzhin no// gal te rtogs ldan nyams bzang spyod pa'i grogs med na// ji ltar mig ldan skyes bu dag ni rkang pa med dang mo chung
195b1(rgyud 'grel): don dam rnal ma chags med don la spyang bya ste// mi spang mi sgrub myi zhen mi spyod mi 'grog parla// rang lugs ci bder spyod pa rab mchog dam pa'o// kun rdzob sangs rgyas mi ro'i gdeng chen ldan gyur kyang // sems
195b2(rgyud 'grel): can tshogs chen mi spang ci nus 'bad par bya// 'khor bdag la dogs pa'i sems med 'jigs bral yang // sdig po'i las rnams phra mo dag nas 'dzem par bya// chos rnams stong pa mkha' ltar rtsa bral rto/
195b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang // chags sdang 'dzin chags mtha' dag rtsad nas spang bar bya// chos nyid mtha' bral zang thal chen po'i don rtogs kyang // brtan pa ma thob bar du nyams rtogs gzhan la gsang // don dam bdag gzhan
195b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par rtogs gyur kyang // kun rdzob 'gro la phan pa'i don chen dag la bsam// 'dren pa gzhan la mi bltos gdengs dang ldan gyur kyang // bka' drin can gyi bla ma spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur// chags
195b5(rgyud 'grel): shing zhen par bcas pas kun la dgag bsgrub byed// rgyu dang mi 'tsham 'gal ba'i spyod pa gol ba'o// mthong bya mthong byed med pas tha dad rang sar grol// nyam su myong mkhan stor bas rtsol sgrub kun dang bral// thob
195b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'i 'bras bu stor bas re ngogs kun las gro la// nga bdag rtsad nas thon pas bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal// dngos 'dzin rang sar zhig pas 'khor 'das kun las grol// rig pa bzhi lo dag pas rdzogs sang
196a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyus zhes brjod// chos blo zad sar zad pas mya ngan 'das zhes bshad pa'i phyir// ma bcos ma bsgyur sbyangs thob kun las yongs su grol/ e ma ho// phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba zab mo'i sgra chen de//
196a2(rgyud 'grel): gdags gzhi gang yin stong pa zhes bya'ang btags pa tsam// skad cig ngo bos stong par bdag myed su yis rtogs so// rtogs mkhyen nyid med ming tsam btags pa tsam// de nyid yang dag ma yin gdul bya'i snang
196a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// gdul bya nyid la'ang bdag med sgyu ma sprul pa 'dra// phyag rgya chen po zhes bya byis pa'i blos btag so// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul zhes bya ming tsam btags pa tsam// 'khrul par tshor zhing rig pa'i skyes bu su zhig yin/
196a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu myang 'das rdul tsam med cing mi dmigs na// grol dang mya grol zhes bya glo bur sgro btags te// nam mkha' zhi zhing dag la med pa grol lam ci// kun rdzob don dam zhes bya'ang nan gyis btags pa ste/
196a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings la bden pa gnyis med chos dbyings med// do ha mdzod ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug byin pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
196a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI be ro tsa nas rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// / brgyud pa ni birba ba/ nag po pa/ slob dpon sgra mkhan zhabs/ slob dpon pu ra ba/ shrI bai ro tsa na'o//
197a1(rgyud 'grel): lam 'bras gsungs mdo bzhugs so//
197b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa'i zhabs pad la btud do// lam 'bras gsung mdo byi bar bya// sems can la nyon mongs pa'i snang ba la ma dag pa'i snang ba la// rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin la nyams kyi snang ba/
197b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la dgra pa'i snang ba'o// kun gzhi rgyu rgyud la 'khor 'dus tshang bris rtswa rgyud/ lus thabs rgyud sogs la gdan sogs gsum pa bzhi yis rgyu'i
197b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang / lam du skyed rim la stsogs lnga pa bzhis bstan/ mnyam gzhag gi dam tshig sogs bsrung / rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs kyis nyams chags bye skang / 'dod yon sogs lnga yis mnyes pa sogs bya/
197b4(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi thun bzhi la dbang bzhi bsgoms pas/ lus la brten nas bde chen gyi sgrib pa bragag cing 'tshang rgya bar gsal bris bshad rgyud/ phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud ni/ 'bras bu'i dbang bzhi yis thams
197b5(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen to// tshad ma bzhis 'bras bu gtan la phab nas/ 'gal 'dus skyon med sogs gsum gyis bsam gtan gyi dug dbyung / zas spyod lam/ rlung thig le/ phyag rgya ma bsten/ dngas ma lnga'i bde ba
197b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbang po lnga nyams dang ma bral bas bdud rtsi bsten/ 'khor ba'i rtsa bzhi dang / 'khor lo rnam lnga gzhan rnams dang / sa thog mtha' la re re/ gsum pa bcus par gyi rtse mdung dral bas la dor/ 'jug pa sel
198a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lam yid 'dag pa'i rnam rtog bsgoms pas lta ba'i dug nga byung / rnam shes lngas yul lnga ma spangs pas bdud rtsi bsten/ dag pa'i chos rnams gdong nas stong par shar pas la dor/ gsang
198a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags snyan rgyud la sogs bzhi ma chad pas/ lus khyad par can la bsten nas dngos po'i mtha' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ gzhan dbang rten 'brel byang chub chen po'i lam// chos thams cad rten cing 'brel pa
198a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba lo rgyus kyi tshad ma'o// kun gzhi rnam shes dag pa'i byang chub chen po/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lnga yis lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o// thabs kyi phyogasu lhung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i lam gyi bar chad ni/
198a4(rgyud 'grel): dad pa brtan pos bsrung ba'i 'khor lo// sngags zlos/ sngags mdung / chos rnams sems nyid snang ba/ gzhan dbang rten 'brel/ gzugs brnyen yin phyir/ de kho na nyid rgya mtsho'i don dang ma bral bas bsrung / shes rab la
198a5(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i bdud lam gnyis/ lha grub brgyad bsgyur ba'o// nang gang bdud lam la sogs bcu dang brda ma shes na 'ong brda shes pas bsrung / grib dang sgrib pa thig le 'dzag pa bsrung / tshogs lam nas tha mal pa'i lus dag
198a6(rgyud 'grel): yid dang bral bas bral ba'i 'bras bu bzhi thob nas/ khams 'du lugs gsum gyis phyogs med rnams dang / rlung sems bdag byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun
198b1(rgyud 'grel): ltur lam dgrod na/ sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ las kyi rlung pho mo/ mra ning gI rlung / thod rgal gyi ye shes kyi me 'barla bas/ khams 'dus pa dang po/ rgyun gyi rlung po lag ca can gyis rtswa dral
198b2(rgyud 'grel): sems gnas/ rta rmi/ rtsa rlung gi zug 'byung / sna tshigs 'dud la sogs gzhi rtsa ba'i rlung la sogs zin pa'i bye brag bdun gyis yan lag gi rlung rims kyis nang du 'gag de tsi na thig le mang du kha 'bu/ rten mnya
198b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'dre/ de la rten nas sems nang du gnas/ rnam shes lnga nang du 'dus/ phung po lnga dul/ ye shes kyi 'gro ldog byed/ sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i mthong snang rmi lam nyams gsum gsum ni rnam rtog sngon du song ba ltar khams
198b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum kun tu snang ngo // sa chu la thim na smig rgyu/ chu me la thim na du ba/ me rlung la thim na srin bu me khyer/ rlung rnam par shes pa la thim na mar me 'bar ba/ rnam par shes pa 'od gsal la thim na nA mkha' sprin med
198b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu/ so chu mau rlung dang rlung sems mnyam par 'dus na khams gsum kun du me 'bar bya lta bur snang / tshu rlung la dang spu lus grang / rlung gi rlung 'du 'phro dang rang 'phur bya 'byung / 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung mnyam
198b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang / lha mo sna tshogs kyis gar mchod/ 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung mnyam rgyu dang lha mo sna tshogs dang dri ro// na mkha' dang mnyam pa dang spu lus bdi/ bdud rtsi lnga dang de bzhin gshegs sku sogs/ si h+la dang nyi ma/
199a1(rgyud 'grel): ga b+hur dang b+hU gA tsa blun rnamasmra TIg sman dang skAr ma/ rtswa 'dzin la sogs su shI spyod la stsogs/ chags spyad rnam pa lha dang / nyam nga mya ngan 'dre'i na/ mchi ma rtsar g+hu yul dang
199a2(rgyud 'grel): mchim/ lte bur dang po chags pa'i rigs drug gi yi ger rlung sems mnyam par 'dus rig sa drug gi gar sngags dere khrid pa/ rmi lem nyams lta bu khams kun tu snang ngo // oM las blasam
199a3(rgyud 'grel): gtan sogs kyi ting nge 'dzin yum gyi mkha'/ AM las yang dag par thim na khams gsum na mkha'/ yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la sogs kyi pheM brang du thi ma nI tshos sku nyamasu myong zhing
199a4(rgyud 'grel): bzung 'dzin grol/ hUM lus gsal zhing yang lnga rang 'byung gi ye shes na mkha' shin tu dri ma med/ khams 'dus pa brar pA rlung blo lag ca bri bso rtsa dral/ thig le'i zug dang mthong snang brtan no// mdor na
199a5(rgyud 'grel): ruk+ka la sogs su srin+da po sogs/ dri la can gyi sku lha'i mig rnam par dag pa bzhin/ srid pa'i rtse mo man tsAd ting nge 'dzin gyi nyamasu 'byung ba snyam byed pa/ bshad kyis mi lang ba mtshon cing lnga bcu la gsang
199a6(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i phyi'i rten 'brel rlung log sogs gsum gsum ni/ nang gi mkha' 'gro ma lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga/ byang chub chen po'i rten 'brel mdzad pas/ dngos grub rnams rang la
199b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar shes shing re zhing sol ba'i blo sel to// bdud dang gol sa rnams rang gi lum dang rten 'brel du shes pas skyon yon tan du bslang zhing rim pa yin men du skye ba'i drod byung rgyal du gtang / shes rab kyi
199b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu lhung ba'i lam la/ lha'i bu'i bdud 'od bya sad pa bzhis bsrung / sgom pa mi 'tsher ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ yul 'gags pas rang yi dam gyi lho dang / gug skyed kyi dgos pa bsam zhing ting nge
199b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin chu bsnyam pas/ khams 'dus pa thA ma rlung po lam tsa bral bas rtse dral/ skye mched drug gi nang du thig le 'dus pas rjesu dran pa drug yang dag par shes/ sbrul sku 'ga' mthong / sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i yang dag par spong
199b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi ni/ sbrul sku las dbang gsum gyi rjes las byung ba'i shes pa bsam zhing / dgyes sogs pad can bcu gnyis ma'i rtsa brtsal zhing / snying po'i a kun d+har gyi sna rtser ngal rgyu la sogasu rig pa yid 'jug pas/
199b5(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yi nga gsum rdo rje dkyil krung bcas/ thig le rlung non pas rnga sgra la sogs mi thos pas/ cho ga sha sogs kyi bdud choms pa'o// nang gis sangs rgyas rnams kyi lami srid pa'i rtse mor phyin cing ma skyes bI
199b6(rgyud 'grel): chos la bzod dka' ba stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa'o// dbu mar sems rtog med log sems 'phos na bzod pa/ 'khor ba'i chos las 'das shing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam chos rnams rdzogs pas chos rnams kyi nang
200a1(rgyud 'grel): na mchog go// de ltar nyams skyon can skyon med dang / phyi dbyibs kyi a nas yar rlung sems mnyam par 'dus nas lam du 'byung ba rnams ngo bo rang mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam
200a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyi nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lam gyis/ sbrul sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed po/ lus dag par byed pa bum pa'i dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun nI/ rtswa rin
200a3(rgyud 'grel): po che'i pho brang bzhi/ gtso bo gsum ste lus kyi dkyil 'khor mthong bas rtog pa'i 'gro ldog byed/ sprul skra'i zhing khams brgya sprul zhing nyams sbyin brgya/ 'dod brgya'i gyed/ mar brgya 'chad/ ting nge 'dzin mi 'dra
200a4(rgyud 'grel): ba brgya la snyoms par 'jug nus/ rigs drug gi rtsar khyad par du ma'i rten mthong nas dga' la g.yang za/ ngo tsha lnga skrag bro/ sngon bla mas rgyu dus na bston pa'i 'khor 'das dbyer med de tsa na rtogs/ snying rje skye/ mchi ma
200a5(rgyud 'grel): ltung gzhan gyi sems sna tshogs shes/ 'dod yon sna tshogs mthong pas dgod bro/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs skad cig rnams 'byung ba rnams nang gi zhing khams mthong bas so// nang ma mthong bar phyi ma mthong // de tsan
200a6(rgyud 'grel): ling+ga brtan/ rdo rje'i rtser lhan cig skyes pa'i sar thig le gnas pa bltas lus bde bas myos shing brgya la/ rang gzhan ngo mi shes/ nang rtags rlung sor gcig 'gags/ phyi rtags gsang gnas phyed thig les bstan sa dang
200b1(rgyud 'grel): bo'o// // yang sprul sku las dbang bzhi bzhi sgom lam sa gnyis pa nas sprul pa'i sku'i zhing khams stong la sogs pa sprul pa la sogs pa nus/ yon tan la sogs 'phel/ 'gro ldog la sogs
200b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gags/ nang rtags rlung sor drug 'gags/ phyi rtags gsang gnas lte ba'i snying / thig les brtan/ longs sku 'ga' mthong / sgom lam sa drug go// // yang longs sku las dbang bzhi bzhi bdag byin gyis
200b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa'i rim pa'i lam nas/ longs sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ ngag dag pa gsang ba'i dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags dbang po lnga dang dngas ma'i rlung lnga la mnga' brnyes/ nus pa lnga
200b4(rgyud 'grel): dang lta stangs rnams la thogs pa med/ b+ha ge'i dkyil 'khor du rigs drug gis sa bon mthong // sa bon drug la mnga' brnyes/ sems can rnams kyi skad du chos ston cing chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la thogs pa
200b5(rgyud 'grel): lte bar yi ge'i phyi mo brgyad / A li kA li mthong nas/ mdo sdeste'i chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la thogs pa med/ bdud rtse lnga dang ro drug la longs spyod/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gyur pa rnams/ a ni
200b6(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bru ces pa drug gis gsal lo// sa bdun yan chad long sku'i zhing khams 'khor bzhi'i brgya dung phyur la sogs sprul ba la sogs pa nus/ nang rtags rlung sor bcu 'gags// phyi rtags mgrin smin thig les
201a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan// sgom lam sa bcu'o// // yang dbang bzhi bzhi/ sems dag pa dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam nas chos sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi
201a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang / mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags/ stobs lnga ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rlung lnga bskyod pa'i dngas ma'i dngas ma/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthong nas/ rtags bstan pa/ sku gsum ye shes lnga la
201a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs dbang thob nas/ bdud rtsi lnga gar 'du mthong na sangs rgyas rnams gzhan don mdzad pa mthong / sprul pa bde chen thig le 'du ba mthong / sangs rgyas rnams 'og man gyi gnas na zab mo la bzhugs pa mthong //
201a4(rgyud 'grel): lte ba sprul par bdud rtsi lnga dang rlung lnga 'dus pa mthong na/ longs sku'i rigs lnga yum gyi b+ha ga na bzhugaso nas skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' la gsang bsgrogs pa mthong / phyag rgya ma'i ngangs mI dang sa ma mthong na/
201a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes la thogs pa med/ rtsa yig rnams su dngas ma 'drongaswa na rdzu 'phrul la thogs pa med/ de nyid slar spos na sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran/ nang rtags rlung sor bcu gnyis 'gags/ phyi rtags spyi gtsug hri la thig
201a6(rgyud 'grel): les brtan/ sa bcu gnyis so// // yang dbang bzhi bzhi mthar byin gyi lam nas mthar thug rten 'brel mthar thug 'da' ba/ rdo rje'i rba rlabs kyi lam gyis phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub rig ma'i skyes bu
201b1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam/ ngo bo nyid kyi sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ bzhi pa las ngag yid kyi dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni/ rnam shes brgyud 'dug
201b2(rgyud 'grel): kar 'bras bu gnyis 'thob ste/ sa chen 'di ni dga' zhing rangs la mgu/ de rnam pa drug pu g.yo/ bdud gnas su sgra grag/ phyag rgya ma'i gnas su khams gsum mthong / mkha' 'gro ma rnams ring nas 'du/ ha rI mo la sogs
201b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dbang phyug gi don brgyad 'char/ nang rtags srog rtsol a ba d+hU tIr 'jug/ phyi rtags gtsug tor phyed thig les brtan/ sa phye dang bcu gsum mo// / bzhi pa yid kyi dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags
201b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'i phyogs gcig 'thob ste/ 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings/ byang chub sems kyis ni 'bigs/ 'bras bu longs sku'i zhing khams rab bkram la sogs pa sprul ba la sogs pa nus/ sa bcu
201b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum thob kau rA sa bcu mu la sogs pa yid kyis bkug ste/ slob dpon dus gsum bde bar gshegs bcud 'dus yin// yi ngam lha dang bla ma dbyer med la// b+ha gar dngos grub len pa'i rten 'brel gyis// srid pa
201b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i lam/ ngo bo nyid kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ 'bras bu longs sa'i zhing khams ma lus pa la sogs pa bsgul pa la sogs pa nus/ nang rtags sreg rtsol a
202a1(rgyud 'grel): ba d+hU tIr 'gags/ phyi rtags gtsug tor hril thig les brtan/ phyi nang gi rten 'brel 'gros bzhi thim pa rnams kyis sgrom nyams skyon yod med phyed pa sa bcu gsum pa'o// // thams cad
202a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen to// bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin sarba rtenA 'brel 'grig pa ltar snang 'tshang rgya kar 'khor chom bu cig 'tshang rgya'o// gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ni// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dbang // rtogs pas brtags pas rtog
202a3(rgyud 'grel): med rtogs// ye shes snang ba de bzhin no// lam zab bla ma/ dam tshig lus so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa/ lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag dang man ngag du bcas pa rdzogs so// // sam pa tha mi ti//
202a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skud duD+heM ma hA mu t+yA u pa de sha/ blong sprad du/ phyag rgya chen po'i man+ta ngag/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshalo// phyag rgya chen po bstan du med gyur kyang // dka' ba spyod cing tha ma la gus pad+ma
202a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal bzod ldan blo ldan nI ra pa// skal ldan khyod kyi snying la 'di ltar byos// kye'o 'jig rten chos la legs ltos dang // rtag mi thub ste rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// rmi lam sgyu ma ngon la yod ma yin/ des na spro ba skyeng 'jig
202a6(rgyud 'grel): rten bya ba thong // 'khor g.yog chags sdang nye 'brel kun spongs la// gcig pu nags 'dab ri khrod dgon par bsgoms// bsgom du med pa'i ngang la gnas par gyis tho ba med thob na phyag rgya chen po thob// 'khor ba'i
202b1(rgyud 'grel): chos 'di don med chags sdang rgyu// byas chos snying po med pas don dam snying po ltos// blo yi chos kyis blo 'das don mi mthong // byas pa'i chos kyis byar med don mi rnyed // blo 'das byar med don de thob 'dod na// rang sems
202b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsad chod rig pa gcer bur zhog/ rtog pa dri ma'i chu de dang su chug/ snang ba dgag bsgrub mi bya rang sor zhog/ spong len med na phyag rgya chen por grol// dper na ljon shing yal ga lo 'ang ba rgyas// rtsa bcad yal ga lo 'ang ba khri
202b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum bskams// dper na bskal stong bsags pa'i mun pa yang // sgron me gcig gis mun pa'i tshogs rnams sel// de bzhin rang sems 'od gsal skad cig gis// bskal par bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus sel /
202b4(rgyud 'grel): blo dman skye bo don la mi gnas na// rlung gri gan du bzung rig pa bcud la bor// lta stangs dang ni sems 'dzin du ma yis// rig pa dang la mi gnas bar du btsun/ dper na na mkha'i dkyil ni brtag byas ni// mtha' dang dbus/
202b5(rgyud 'grel): su 'dzin pa 'gag par 'gyur// de bzhin sems kyis sems la brtag byas na// rnam rtog tshor 'gag sems kyi rang bzhin mthong // dper na sa rlangs sprin ni na mkhar dngos// gar yang song med gang yang gnas pa med/ de
202b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sems las byung ba'i rtogs tshogs kyang // rang sems mthong bas rtog pa'i rba rlabs dengs// dper na nam mkha' kha dog dbyibs las 'das// dkar nag dag gis gos med 'gyur ba med// de bzhin rang sems 'od
203a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal kha dog dbyibs las 'das// dge sdig dkar gnag chos kyis gos mi 'gyur// dper na gsal dag nyi ma'i snying po de// bskal pa stong gi mun pas sgrib mi nus// de bzhin rang sems
203a2(rgyud 'grel): snying po 'od gsal de// bskal ba'i 'khor bas sgrib par mi nuso// dper na na mkha' stong pa rab brtags kyang // na mkha' la ni 'di 'dra brjod du med// de bzhin rang sems 'ong gisal brjod gyur kyang // brjod
203a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'di 'dra grub ces gdags gzhi med// dper ne na mkha' gang la gang gis brten// de bzhin rang sems phyag chen rten yul med// ma bcos gnyug ma'i ngang du gleng las zhog/ bcings pa klong gyur grol bar
203a4(rgyud 'grel): the tsom med// de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin na mkha' 'dra// chos rnams ma lus ngo ru ma 'dus med// lus kyi bya ba yo thong rnal mar zhog/ dag gi sgra brjod ma mang brag ca 'dra// yid lnga mi sems la zla'i chos la ltos
203a5(rgyud 'grel): lus la snying po med pas sdug sdong 'dra// sems ni na mkha'i dkyil ltar bsam yul 'das// de dang btang gzhag med par gleng las zhog/ sems la gtang so med na phyag chen yin// de la goms pas bla med byang
203a6(rgyud 'grel): chub 'thob// dmigs pa'i yul med sems kyi rang bzhin gsal// bgrod pa'i lam med sangs rgyas lam sna zin// bsgom med goms pas bla med byang chub 'thob// bzung 'dzin kun 'das lta ba'i rgyal po yin//
203b1(rgyud 'grel): bya brtsol med na spyod pa'i rgyal po yin// re dogs med na 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur// kun gzhi skye med bag chags sgrib g.yogs bral// mnyam rjes mi bya skye med snying por zhog/ snang ba rang snang blo yi chos rnams zang // mu
203b2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yongs grol lci ba'i rgyal po yin// mu med gting yangs bsgom pa'i rgyal po mchog byar med rong gnas spyod pa'i rgyal po mchog/ re med rang gnas 'bras bu'i rgyal po mchog/ las ni dang po gcod rong chu dang 'dra// bar
203b3(rgyud 'grel): du chu bo gang gA ngal bus 'bag/ tha ma chu bran ma bu phrad pa 'dra// sngags su smra dang pha rol phyin pa dang // 'dul bya'i sde snod la sogs chos rnams dang // rang rang gzhung dang grub pa'i mtha' yis kyang // 'od gsal phyag rgya
203b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po mthong mi 'gyur// yid lnga mi byed zhes 'dod kun dang bral// rang byung ra zhi chu yi n+ya rlabs dang 'dra// zhi 'dod byung bas 'od gsal ma mthong sgribs// rtogs pa bsrung sdom dam tshig don las nyams// ma gnas mi
203b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas mi dmigs don las mi 'da' na// dam pa nyams len+da mun pa'i sgron ma yin// zhi 'dod kun bral mtha' la mi gnas na// sde snod chos rnams ma lus mthong bar 'gyur// don 'dir gzhol na 'khor bya'i bA tson las thar/
203b6(rgyud 'grel): don 'dis mnyam gzhag ma lus sdig sgrib sreg/ bstan pa'i sgron me zhe su bshad pa yin// don 'dir mi mos skye bo blun po rnams// 'khor ba'i chu bos rtag tu khyer bar zang // ngan song sdug bsngal mi bzod snying re rje// sdug
204a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thar 'dod bla ma mkhas pa bsten// byin brlabs zhugs pas rang sems grol bar 'gyur// las rgya bsten na bde stong ye shes 'char// thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs snyoms par
204a2(rgyud 'grel): sa// ngal bar dbab cing dkyil bzlog drang ba dang // gnas su bskyal dang lus la khyab par bya// de la zhan med bde steng ye shes 'char// tshe ring sla dkar med cing zla ltar rgyas// bkrag mngangs gsal zhing stobs
204a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang seng ge 'dra// thun mong dngos grub myur thob mchog la gzhol// phyag rgya chen po gnad kyi gdams pa 'di// 'gro ba skal ldan snying la gnas par shog/ dpal te lo pas nA ro pa la chu po gang gA'i 'gram
204a4(rgyud 'grel): du gsungs pa legs par rdzogs so//
205a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi grub pa bzhugs so//
205b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta sid+d+hi mU la na ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// spyan gsum rab ldan dbu bcad sku mdog dmar// 'chi ba'i 'jigs sel rnal 'byor
205b2(rgyud 'grel): po me yi// phyag rgya 'dzin cing b+hai ra ba ting 'dzin gyis// skyob mdzad phyag rgya'i zhabs la bdag 'dung ngo // rgyud rnams kun tu spros pa'i don// phyag rgya chen po rnam bshad bya// me ni gang gis thos pa la// lha rnams kun gyis bkur
205b3(rgyud 'grel): sti mdzad// skye ba bye ba stong dag tu// legs las rgya chen rnam byas pas// de thob 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// pha rol tu ni rnal 'byor 'gro// g.yon pa'i rting pas bshad lam dgag/ g.yas pa cung zad brkyang byas lnga// 'theb chen
205b4(rgyud 'grel): bol gong log pas gzung // snying ga lkog mas mnan pa ni// sgo dgu dgag pa'i sbyor ba'o// ngo yi rtsa gsum dag la nI// rim pa bzhin du bsnun par bya// 'di ni las kyi phyag rgya'o// rkang pa gcig par sems bsdu zhing // rlung rna
205b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsdus bya ste// rlung gi bsdam pa brtsam par bya// nyi zla gnyis ni gcig par bya// de ltar byas na rlung ni 'gag/ 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya'i// bshong lam 'khor lo gyon du bzlog/ thig le sgra bcas gyen du bslang // rtsa rnam
205b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu g.yo// mchog gi rtsa ni gyen du 'ong // lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrubs par bya// goms pa brtan par gyur pa yis// rang gi me ni gsal ba'i// phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad
206a1(rgyud 'grel): du/ rnal 'byor pa ni nges par 'gro// 'di ni kha sbyor sbyor ba ste// rtsa ba'i gdams par 'dod pa'o// 'di ni rlung gi sbyor ba yin// mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di bsgrub po// phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya// ji
206a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsdam pa'i cho ga shes// dzaMdzi ni lha mo'i phyag rgya yin// ling go'i phyag rgya lha yin no// pho dang mo yi sbyor ba las// phyi rol tu nI skye ba 'byung // ji bzhin sbyor ba 'di gnyis kyis// sre ba nang du bsad par bya// rtsa ni bud med
206a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can te// skyes pa med na 'bras bu med// phyag rgya che dang bsdams pa che// dbye ba med na 'bras bu med// rlung ni 'khor lo gcig tu bsdu// ji srid bsdam pa bzhin du bya// rnal 'byor pa yis gshig por bya// rang gi
206a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung sems gshig par bya// sbyor ba'i rim pas gshig par bya// rlung ni stobs dang ldan byas la// dbu ma'i sgo ru gzhug bya ste// 'khor lo bzhi po rlung gis dbug/ lag gnyis ling ga'i phyag rgya bca'// de ni swa la gzhag nA
206a5(rgyud 'grel): su/ rkang pa'i rtse mos la gzugs// brla ni brdab par bya bA yis// rlung gis rlung ni gshig par bya// rlung gis rung la btog par bya// rlung gis rlung ni bsad par bya// rlung gis yongs la khyob pA yis// rlung gis dngos grub
206a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyin// rlung gis 'chi ba med par 'gyur// des ni bdud rtsi grub par ni// birba nga yis yang dag bshad// legs par bsdams pa lus kyi las// rdo rje rlung rtse bya ba yis// lhun po yi ni bar dag tu// dgug pa'i sbyor
206b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di yis ni// tshangs sogs mdud pa bshig par bya// lhun po'i steng du lha rnams 'gro// lhun po dag ni grayo 'gyur te// des ni thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur// tshangs bya lnga sogs lha rnams bsad// dang po yi ni sbyor
206b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// tshangs pa'i mdud pa bshig par bya// de nas dbang phyug mdud pa bshig/ de be shig nas ni briSh+Nu bshig/ de nas gti mug la sogs spangs// gtsug tor sgo ni smras pa la// rlung gis sgo ni rnam par dwa //
206b3(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'bigs pa chen po'o// bsdam pa che dong 'bigs pa che// phyag rgya che ni gsum pa yin// 'di ni gseng dbang gsum yin no// 'di dag gis na sbyor grub grags// de nyid gsum ni gong rig pas// de ni 'jig rten
206b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rig go// gang gis 'di le gom byas na// thams cad kyis ni mnga' bdag 'gyur// gsang ba lha yi lha rnams dang // mi yi bdag po'i bdag por 'gyur// dbang bskur kun la dbang ba yin// thams cad ma lus
206b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag par 'gyur// des na lha rnams kun gyis 'bad// chos kyi phyag rgyar 'dod pa'o// phyag rgya che la goms par bya// phyag rgya 'di las thams cad 'byung // grub pa chen po'i 'byung ba yin// phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa/
206b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnyis de ni dam pa dang // 'ching ba las ni grol ba dang // lus sems dag la bde ba 'byung // sems la gnas pa tsam gyis kyang // mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dang po'i ming ni yi ge yin// sbyor ba ldan pa
207a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya// dang dang ldan sbyor ba yin// rnal 'byor pa ni nges par ni// phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa yin// phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya// rkang pa lag pa bsdam bya ste// rlung ni lan gsum 'thungs
207a2(rgyud 'grel): byas la// rtsa rnams thams cad 'then par bya// langs pas rtsa rnams gyen du phyogs// nang rnams thams cad bcom nas ni// phyag rgya chen po'i don yang rdzogs// ji ltar na mkha' bar snang la// sprin tshogs 'bar ba 'khrig
207a3(rgyud 'grel): po de// rlung gi shu DA kyis btor ba ltar// de ltar lus 'di dag la ni// nad kyis yongs su bsgos gyur kyang // thabs kyi rlung gis gzhom par bya// 'di ni phyag rgya chen po'o// dz+nyA ye b+ha yi karma yi// lag pas 'byung ba lnga ngag kyang //
207a4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi bya bas many+dzu bya zhing // bsdams pa chen pos gnas pa yi// stobs kyi 'khor lo 'di yis ni// steng du lce yi 'jig rten skrag/ lag pa brkyang bskum 'di yis ni// phyogs bzhi dag kyang g.yo bar byed// rkang bA
207a5(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu brkyang ba yis// klu rnams thams cad skrag par byed// dbang po dul zhing dub pa'i tshe// rtse cig sems kyi ngang la gzhag/ bsdam pa'i sbyor ba bshad par bya// rlung gis lus ni 'dzin par 'gyur// bsdam pa gnyis ni
207a6(rgyud 'grel): shes bya ste// ji ltar thig le gnas pa dang // dzo ni b+ha d+ha'i lha mo yin// mgrin pa bsdams pa lha yin no// dgang ba can dang bum pa can// phyag rgya gzung ba rnam par bya// lha dang lha min kun la gsang // rnal 'byor bsdam
207b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba yis// dbu ma'i sgo ru gtad par bya// lam gsum rnam par bkag byas la// rlung ni nang du gzung bar bya// srog ni rlung yang blun par bya// de ltar byas pas 'og tu 'bab// skad cig nyid la bsdam par bya// steng 'og
207b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa'i rlung dang bsre bar bya// nges ni gyen du bskyod par bya// bshang lam bsdam pa dang ldan pas// rlung ni rnam par bskum pa dang // gyen du brlang ba byas pa yin// 'khrul 'khor dang ni rlung sbyor gyis//
207b3(rgyud 'grel): dgram dang rab tu bsdam par bya// zung 'jug lam gsum bsgom par bya// 'di ltar mi yi lus la ni// grub pa'i lam ni rab gsal ba// nyams myong skye zhing lus rgyas 'gyur// rgas par yang ni mi 'gyur ro// rtsa rnams
207b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyi 'bab pa dang // rtag par 'og tu 'gro ba de// bsnams pa chen po 'di yis ni// rnam par ldog cing 'gyur ba yin// gshibs ni thur du 'gro ba yon// yur ba'i nang du chu 'bab pa// de ni bsdams pas ldog par
207b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de bzhin nang gi lus la yang // lus kyi phyi rol 'gro ba de// rnal 'byor rtag tu shes par bya// lus kyi rtswa ni ma lus pa// 'di ni bsdams par rab tu grags// bsdam bya 'di yi mthu yis ni// lha rnams kun kyang
207b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'gyur// de ltar phyag rgya bzhi yis ni// lan gsum rnam par bkag pa'o// lam cig pa ni gsal ba'o// grub pa lha yi lam du 'gro// skye dang 'chi ba'i lam gnyis po// 'og ni lam du bshad pa yin// bsod
208a1(rgyud 'grel): nams dang ni sdig rgyu yi// de phyir sgron gnyis nu bar spangs// rlung gi bye nyid bum pa can// de ni rab tu mnyam par bya// steng gi lam du rnam byas la// rlung dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis// bsdams pas chu rgyu ma
208a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag pa ltar// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par 'gog/ des na de'i bka' drin gyis// dzo ni gdams pa zhes gragaso// grub pa'i l-im dang yang dag ldan// mau ni 'gyur te gzhan du min// phyag rgya 'di ni shes pa yis// dregs
208a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yod kyang don dang ldan// des na thams cad shes pa yin// bdud rtsi grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi rnal 'byor pa las grub pa thob pa'i rgya gar a de
208a4(rgyud 'grel): bas bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ DA ki ni u pa ya shrI d+ha ru me sa ra b+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba/ bla mo rje btsun
208a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma rje btsun mchog dang byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la// gus pa mchog gis rab tu rtsi
208a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'dud par byas nas kyang // skal ldan gdung ba gang zag gdung ba bcad ba'i phyir// bla ma rnams kyi brgyud pa'i man ngag bri// de la rten gyi gang zag skal ba dang ldan zhing tshogs chen po bsags pa des/ bla ma dam pa rnams
208b1(rgyud 'grel): yun ring bar brten cing gdams pas rgyud yongs su bsgos par gyur kyang // gdams ngag gis goms par ma gyur cing // yid gdung ba ma chad pa dag la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// slob dpon chen po DaM b+hI he
208b2(rgyud 'grel): ru ka la sogs pa rnams la brda rA gsungs pA de dag bladag gris bstan par bya'o// de 'ang mkha' 'gro ma ro mas// slob dpon Doma? b+hi he ru ka la lta ba'i gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa// til 'bru dang ni sgron mas phyogs
208b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gsal bar byed// sngags kyis btab pa'i dug ni sman gyi mchog tu gyur pa ste// rma bya'i zas ni gzhan du gyur pa yong ma yAn// tsan+dan dri dang ri dgas+ya grwa rtsi'i dri bzhin no// chu zla dang ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni tha dad cung zad
208b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ sol ba'i rang bzhin gang kI kha dog nag po dag dang mtshungs// ri chen po gang gis bskyod par mi nus pas// grangs ri'i chu ni gzhan du gyur pa yod min no// dper na dri dang sgeg skya tha dang gyur pa med// nyi ma zla ba'i
208b5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan gsal ba/ yan// mkha' la bya 'phur rjes ni tshol ba rnyed mi 'gyur// nam mkha'i khams ni rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin no// maN+Dal dag ni phyogs las thams cad rab tu snyoms// dper na ro langs dang ni sa
208b6(rgyud 'grel): pra ko ne bzhin// dpa' bo ngo mtshar nor bu shel bzhin no// zhes gsungs te/ de dag ni gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcod pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste dang po'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma sim ha d+ha ras// slob dpon
209a1(rgyud 'grel): Dom+bi he ru ka la bsgom pa'i don brdar gsungs pa ni// gnas ni tshang tshing dag gam dur khrod du// bdag med mi yi mdza' mo dag dang phrad byas la// yid ni rab dga'i bsam pa yis// dper na
209a2(rgyud 'grel): las zin pa'i skyes bu ba zhin// dman pa'i don stor na mkhar khyer bar bya// chu bo chen po rgyun du bapA pa bzhin// drang srong ku shra gtsang ma'i steng du bzhug/ mar me'i rtse mo rlung gis mi bskyod dang // me long g.ya' med
209a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gsal bar phyi// bu ni yid 'ong bral ba'i ma bzhin du// rus sbas dang ni mkhar gzhong nyi ma la// rtsal dang ldan pa'i 'phong slob brtson pa ste// bsdams pa'i btson ni nges par grol bar 'gyur// sa le sbram
209a4(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa'i rgyan bzhin du// bu ram dag gi ro la myang bar bya/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni bsgom pa'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba bcud pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas mkha'
209a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma mA las slob dpon he ru kA la spyod pa'i don brdar gsu ngus pa ni// bag ma dang ni sgron ma'i tshul bzhin te// glang po btsongs la phagu dgod bsad par bya// nya ni rgya mtsho chen por yangs pa che// nags rnams me
209a6(rgyud 'grel): yi phung por rab tu bsreg/ spyan gzigs zas la rtag tu longs spyod bya// res 'ga' mgyo gas pa'i rta la bzhon pa bya// gri gug rnon po'i mtshon cha dag gis ni// lce spyang dur khrod dag tu rnam par rol// 'dab chags khwa
209b1(rgyud 'grel): yi rtsal ni shin tu drag/ wa ni dur khrod nyid du shin tu gzhol// chang 'thungs pa dang yul rnams gzhol ba 'dra// me tog dag la bung ba rgyu ba bzhin// bu chung dang ni seng ge me long mtshungs// stag ni 'jigs pa med
209b2(rgyud 'grel): par kun tu rgyu// lkugs pa dag ni kha las khyod mya 'dra'// zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni spyod pa'i gnas lugs gyi gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams po ste gsum pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma kaM ka ro
209b3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA sa/ sleb dpon Dom+b+hi he ru ka lA nyamasu myong ba'i don brdar gsungs pa ni// dkar po chos ni zla ba'i rim pa ste// gzhu' tshon dag ni nA mkha' dag lnga mdzes// gzhon nu mas mu smras cis te go/ 'khur ba chus bkang
209b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni sgra mi byed/ khug rna lta bu rna ba'i rnam pa yin// dbul po'i rang bzhin gter ldan shin tu ngo mtshar che// lan tshwa chu nyid la ni rab tu thim// na mkha'i nyams las 'da' bar mi byed do// bslus pa'i chos rnams lA ni
209b5(rgyud 'grel): re bar mi byed cing // ral gri'i bar ni snum gyis nyams par 'gyur// rgyal po dag ni rkun pos 'jigs mi byed// wa yis seng ge skrag par 'gyur ma yin// na mkha' lding rnams ni mkha' las dpangs mi dma'// 'di
209b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin dang ma yin gang yang min// sus byas gang yin go bo su zhig yin// zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni nyams su myong ba'i gnas lugs kyi gdung bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas mkha'
210a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mA ma tre yis slob dpon Do b+hI he ru ka la 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba bcad pa'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ yi ge bzhi pa dag gis zla ba rgyus// he ru ka'i na mkha'i ngang nyid de// rdo rje dang ni
210a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma yi ge bral// kha T+wAM ga ni nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin// rdo rje dang ni ljon shing 'bras bu ste// bya ni dang pa chu na rtag tu gnas// pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dab ma rab tu rgyas// Da maT ni bung ba'i rtsi dang mtshungs// bdud rtsi sbrul ldan rnams
210a3(rgyud 'grel): la chu shel te// rin chen bdun lnga rgyal pos mnga' yang mdzad// rnam grangs rnams ni ras kyis shes la bkab// kun+da 'bar ma laM bye brag gang yang mang// rtsal rdzogs pa yi seng ge gang sa la gnas// shul ni phyi nang med par
210a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dag/ btso ma'i gser ni dri mo'i g.yu' dang bral/ zhes gsungs pa sti/ de dag 'bras bu'i gnas lugs k+Shi gdung ba gcod pa'i gdams pa ste lnga pa'o// // mkha' 'gro ma ma hA la sa// slob dpon DoM b+hi he ru ka
210a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ gong du gsungs pa de dag kyang / gnyis med kyi rnal 'byor du bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ rgyal po rnams ni rin chen skal bar ldan// sman pa bzang dang phrad par gyur pa las/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mun pa sel ba ltar
210a6(rgyud 'grel): rus sbal rgya mtsho dag tu 'gro mi 'gyur// stobs ldan gyad kyis pha rol 'joms par byed// ri bo 'gyel na chu rnams 'grub par byed// nags khrod dag na rngon pa glu rnams len// me shel ras bal 'dus pas me 'byung
210b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi ni shin tu ngo mtshur che// chu dang bcas pa'i skye shing lo 'dab rgyas// sbur lena? nor bu dag ni sbyar rnams sdud// shes pa rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ spre'u rnams ni dran par ldan pa
210b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mnyan pas 'gro ba dag ni sgrolnga bur byed// ga bur sbyor bas tshwad pa'i nad rnams sel// dge slong bag dang ldan pa gso sbyong byed// rigs ngan rgya lnga po'i khab tu mi gnas te// bcad par gyur na tA la'i lo
210b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba med// sgyu ma mkhan po sgyu ma'i long so spyod mkhas// rgyal po'i bla mo rgyan dang rab tu ldan// gar mkhan rnams ni gar gyi rnam pa byed// stang ma rnams ni d+han skyugs nang du spyug/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag
210b4(rgyud 'grel): ni gnyisu med pa'i rnal 'byobr-i gyi gnas lugs kyi gdung bcad pa'i gdams pa ste drug pa'o// / de nas mkha' 'gro ma be tos// bla ma zangs gling pa na ga bu ra la// zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi brda
210b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ni// khri snyan sa lo snying rje ldan pa ste// ma ni bu la rab tu chags pa'o// bur ma shing las bu ram 'byung ba ltar// rgya mtshor phyin pas nor bu rnyed par 'gyur// chu yi nang gI zla ba sel mi byed// nor bu me
210b6(rgyud 'grel): shel rtsol sgrub dag dang bral// rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal po nyid kyang yin// tshong pa tshong 'dus dag tu gnas par byed// rdza mkhan dag ni so btang rdza la spyod// sprin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' rab tu dngas// dmu rgod
211a1(rgyud 'grel): mi srun brtul bas zhon par byed// mdza' bo dag gis bsrungs pA re ba med// rmi ldam sad pas dgra dang yongasu bral// khyim bdag mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rab tu rno/ tshwa rkun rab tu mang bya mel tshe mkhwa//
211a2(rgyud 'grel): chu rnams ma lus rgya mtsho ro gcig 'gyur// pha lam rdo rjes dngos po thams cad 'bigs// smig rgyu'i chu yis gdung bar mi byed do// gzha' tshon yal ba dag la sdug bsngal med// rmi lam rmis pa'i nor la
211a3(rgyud 'grel): stor mi byed// brag ca'i sgra la rang nyid dga' ba ste// bram ze chang 'thung ba ni shin tu gsang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor shin tu che/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi gnas lugs
211a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bdun pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma khaN+Da ro ha so// slob dpon DoM b+hi he ru ka lA// pad+mo kha 'byed pa'i gladams pa brdar gsungs pa ni// dbulnga po rnams ni nor med
211a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal de// nam phyed mtshan mo ngag gi dus su ni// rgyal po'i bang mdzod bdagra nyid brku bar bya// ma skyes dpe med mdzes pa'i grogs brkus la// shin tu mgar ba mkhas pa'i lde mig gis// gze ma bzhi bsten
211a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo lcags dbye bar bya// slar yang sgo de dam du bcad par bya// rked stan gzhug cing sked gser bsdom par bya// sgo ba po de yongasu bsad bya zhing // 'bru mar 'bar ba bstegs byas la// btsa' med lcags la byas pa
211b1(rgyud 'grel): drag gi gyis// rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa mgo bcud de// dmag dpon chen po dug gis bsad par bya// mel tse ba dang blon po rnams kyang bsad// de nas rgyal po'i bang mdzod kha phye la// gos bzang dag gis yongasu
211b2(rgyud 'grel): dril ba yi// gser dang dngul gyi ga'u kha phye la// phyogs med pa yi nor bu rin chen blta// mar me dang ni na mkha'i bu mo'i tshul// nyi ma dang ni zla bas bdud rtsi 'thigs// che bas che ba'i rab tu che ba nyid// rma bya khyi dang
211b3(rgyud 'grel): phag dang smyon pa nyid// shwa zla bung ba shin tu rol par byed/ ces gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni pad+mo kha dbye ba'i man ngag gi gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa'i gdams pa ste brgyad pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor pa tai l-i pas
211b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal nA ro pa la// bla ma'i chos bcu drug pa zhes bya ba'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni// sa gzhi bzang po dag gi thun mong la// blo dman rnams kyis las la ma zhugs shing // sdug bsngal nadu kyis gzir ba
211b5(rgyud 'grel): bsal ba'i phyir// ded dpon lta bu dgra gis sems bskyed la// mu tig 'phyang ba chen po gzung byas la// 'byung ba sa chu me rung dbang du bsdus// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi nas rin chen btsal// sbrang rtsi'i bcud ni mar
211b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis snying por ldan// goms par bya zhing bzo la byang bar bya// phye ma la ba dang ri dwags bung ba dang // nya dang glang chen dag las rab tu grol// dug mangs ma phogs phog kyang slar la gso// tha rgod chu yis rab tu
212a1(rgyud 'grel): sa byalab tu nor mang phyugs cing shin tu phyu // zhing pa'i las lnga rab tu gus par 'gyur// ma yis bu ni rab tu sbyin par byed// 'joms byed seng ge'i bla ma de dgra la// lus ngag yid gus yo byad ci dgos
212a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul// gus par ldan pas de 'dra yang dang yang // brtsal med bstan cing bsnyen bkur rab tu 'bad// ces gsungs pa s+t+wa~M/ de dag ni bla ma chos de rnams dang ldan pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba ste dgu po'o// /
212a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rnal 'byor pa ti lo pas// dpal nA ro pa la slob ma'i chos bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i brdar gsung pa ni// gcan zan mche ba dag gis ma rungs rma med pa// skyug bsngal btson ra 'di na yun ring nad kyis the bas//
212a4(rgyud 'grel): khang bzangs dam pa nang nad bde ba yon tan ldan// klu yi rgyal po 'gro la char rgyun rtag tu 'bebs// drug sdong lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lo 'dab 'bras bu chags pa med// spu gri'i sor chags sbrang rtsi'i ro rnams rtag tu spong bar
212a5(rgyud 'grel): byed// bde ba'i chos kun gsod par ldan pa'i skyes bu sems stobs ldan// rma yod bag yod gnas mi byed// mi bzod nad kyis gzir pa sman pa dag la rab tu gus// skom pas rab gdungs nges par btung ba 'ba'
212a6(rgyud 'grel): zhig sgrub par byed// rlan bral rus sbal rgya mtsho chen po mthong na rab tu dga'// mgo la me lces zin pa myur du sel bar byed// rin chen snod mchog de dag tu// ro mchog bcud kyis nges par 'gengs// mun pa dag la sgron
212b1(rgyud 'grel): me bzhin// skal ldan bya ba gsal bar byed// slob ma chos de rnams dang ldan pa bsten// de las zlog pa spang bar bya'o// slob ma bsten pa'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro
212b2(rgyud 'grel): ma kaM kra ro ma ha sa// bla ma zungs gling pA nA ga pu ra la// 'khrul pa'i shes pa gcad pa'i brda brgyad gsungs pa ni// byis pa chung ngur gyur pa rnams kyis ni// me long bzhin lnga thA dad dag tu rtogs// shin tu blo gros dman
212b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ri mo mkhan// rang gis bris pa'i ro mo dag la skrag/ mkhris pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i mig can dag/ mthong ba'i yul rnams drag la chags sdang skye// ji ltar dar gyi srin bu dag gis ni// rang gi khaM chu'i rnam pas
212b4(rgyud 'grel): 'ching bar byed// mi mkhas dman pa'i gang zag la dro no// sgyu mra'i 'phrul gyi rnam pas bslus pa yin// rgya dang snying la sogs pas rI dwags ni// rang dbang med pararA rab tu bsdams par 'gyur// mi mthun deg yis zin
212b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa'i btson// lcags sgrogs dam pa dag gis bdecings gyur la// rmi lam na ni khri mun dong bcug pa// de tshe sdug bsngal mi bzod skye ba yin// bla ma bsten cing nges shes bskyed// gnyug ma goms parA bsten par
212b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ 'khrul pa yini shes pa nyid// reg pa nyid de yis nyid// 'khrul pa'i shes pa spang byas la// gnyug ma'i ye shes goms par bya'o// 'khrul pa'i shes pa ngo shes par bya ba'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
213a1(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro ma bi la de khris// rnal 'byor pa'i smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la ri ta pa la la// de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyid shu brdar gsungs pa ni// zhing pa rnams ni rim gyis la
213a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug/ shing rta dag ni 'khor lo gnyis dang ldan// dpe med na mkha' na mkha' nyid du na gnas// rig pa'i mangs ni thams cad 'bigs par byed// chu'i nang du ut+pal shin tu mdzes// rtog pa bral ba rgya mtsho chen po nyid//
213a3(rgyud 'grel): mun nag rab tu spangs pa na mkha' ste// drang srong nags khrod gnas pa shring lo'i gos// rtsa la rdzogs seng ge grang+ga lA da dung gnas// 'dab ldan bya ni mkha' la mthon por gcod// sman mchog be ta'i 'bras bu gdod
213a4(rgyud 'grel): nas grub// 'bru mar snong khyer skad cig tsam mi yengs// dka' thub can ni shin tu bag dang ldan// ri yi khrod na ljon shing rab tu rgyas// bram ze 'jug ngogs dgra na dri ma 'khru// thag pa'i 'jur ba lhod par lhod// gang
213a5(rgyud 'grel): gA'i chu ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab// gdol pa dag ni rtag tu slong mos 'tsho// mdzes pa rtag tu me long lta bar byed// ri rgyal ri bo mchog rab rtag tu brtan/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor
213a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu brdar gsungs pa'o// de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor shes par bya ba'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor tsi to mas/ rje btsun ri khrod pa la// zag bcas kyi bde ba las su rung bar
213b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir// gdams pa brdar gsung sna pa// rten cing 'brel pa dag gi las rnams ni// phan+ta sAm+b+ha tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par byed// dusmra rnams kun dang zla bla rgyus bya yin// mun pa'i tshogs rnams nges pad+ma
213b2(rgyud 'grel): sol byed na// tshwa rgo med pa'i zhing pa dag gis ni// 'bras bu'i nus pa yongasu skyed par byed// 'khor lo gnyis dang rab tu ldan pa yis// shing rta mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis pha rol 'gro// rten thabs mkhas pa rnams kyi
213b3(rgyud 'grel): lud kyis// zhing pa'i myu gu rab tu rgyas par byed// ji srid 'dab ma rdzogs pa'i bya// de srid 'jam pa'i tshang na rten par byed// tshang pas gdungs pa'i dug gi sbrul rnams ni// bya ba gzhan dag btang nas tsan ngan snyegs
213b4(rgyud 'grel): zo chu rgyud mkhan 'dod par ni// chu rnams ji ltar srid par byed// 'di ni thun myong ma yin gdams pa ste// rtag tu bla mo mchog la gus pa dang // tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs pa ye spyod yul te// skal pa dang ni
213b5(rgyud 'grel): lhun pas 'bad par bya// zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs stobs yan lag brdar gsungs pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// // dur khrod chen po ho ha sgrogs pa zhes bya bar slob dpon chen
213b6(rgyud 'grel): Dom+b+hi he ru kas/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i dus su/ 'du bar 'os pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams kyis bab col du bdud rtsi chu bo lta bu'i gdams ngag
214a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bya bar/ gdam pa bran ltar rang dbang med pa'i mi rnams la// rje bo bzhin du bde ba'i dus skabs myed// gra ya' ma phyis pa'i me long ngos dag la// bzhin ni gzugs brnyan gsal bar 'gyur
214a2(rgyud 'grel): ba med// rgyu nga bral ba'i gzhu dang 'phong mkhan dang // rtsal dang ldan yang srid mi byed// snod nang ma bkrus shin tu btsog pa'i nang // ro mchog zas bzang dag gis 'gengs pa med// tshad ldan zhing pa mkhas pa
214a3(rgyud 'grel): ngadag rnams kyis// dus min sa bon 'debs pa yongasu spong // rkun po blo gros gzhon la gau tamyas pas ni// brkus par gyur kyang sdug bsngal rtag tu skyed// btsub shing yan lag rdzogs par ma gyur pa// me ni
214a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar rung ba nam yang med// bag yod blo ldan mkhas pa gang zhig gis// zhubs med snod du bcud rnams blugs mi byed// 'bru mar 'byar bar mi 'dod skyes bu ni// rtag tu rlung rnams g.yo bar byed cing
214a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dug can sbrul ni mkhas pa dag rnams kyis// mthong bar mi 'dod thag ring yongs su spong zhes gsungs pa ste// de dag ni slob dpon DoM b+hi h+ye ru kas rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams la bdud rtsi lta bu'i
214a6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag snod ma brtogs pa rnams la mi brtan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // rje btsun nA ro pas/ bla ma gengs gseng pa la// nor bu rin po che ngos gzung ba'i gdams ngag bstan pa ni/ nang gi mun pa'i rgya
214b1(rgyud 'grel): mtsha chen pa ru// rin thang med pa'i nor bu rab stor bas// ze ma lnga dang rab tu ldan pa yis// mche ba gnyis gtsigs phag pa zos par 'gyur// lcags sna gsum la brdungs pa'i ral gri yis// phyag pa'i shwa dang rus
214b2(rgyud 'grel): pa so sor dbye// de nas nor bu rin chen btsal bar bya// rnyed par gyur na chu yis bkru// de nas rgyal mtshan rtse la phyur bar bya// 'dod pa'i don la gsol bya gdab byas 'byung // dri ma med pa'i nor bu rin chen de//
214b3(rgyud 'grel): nges par na mkha'i dkyil du sba bar bya// nor bu lhun po ri yi rtse la bzhag/ nor bu mI dang chu yis rab tu gdul// nor bu byA yau 'dab ma gdags par bya// nor bu chu bo chen po'i gzhung la bskur// nor bu mar me'i ngos
214b4(rgyud 'grel): la bstan par bya// nor bu sbron bI lag tu gtad la gagag/ nor bu me long d+hi la bstan lasas// nor bu ras bal phung po'i steng du gzhug/ nor bu rin chen dri za'i grong du bcol// nor bu rin chen rgyal po'i gter du s+pha benga? bya// nor pu rin chen me dpung
214b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil du ste// nor bu rin chen rgyan po'i nor nyid yin// nor bu rin+da chen shel gyi steng du gzhag/ nor bu ner can bstan pa'i nor// nor bu'i nor ni btsa' zhes gsungs pa ste// de dag ni ye shes kyi nor bu ngos gzung
214b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thabs brdar gsungs pa'o// rang gi gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes nges gzung ba'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcwo lnga pa'o// // slob ma skal ldan tshogs bsags rin chen lta bu'i ga
215a1(rgyud 'grel): zag 'di// dpag tu med pa'i gud mas ngag rnams kyis rgyud dag yongs su sbyangs gyur kyang // gdung bya chad par ma gyur bla ma rnams kyis yongs su gdungs gyur pa// gdams ngag rnams dang tha
215a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdung ba bcad phyir brgyud pa'i man ngag bkod// rje btsun mchog dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bzod mdzod la// de las byung ba'i dge ba zla ba lta bu'i dri ma med pa des/ 'gro ba ma lus yid kyi gdung
215a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yongs su bcad par gyur nas kyang // phyag rgya chen po'i dri med sa la ma lus yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gdams ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya'o//
215a4(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhung du bgrod pa rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu d+hA badz+ri gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba/ dpa la shra ba rI dbang phyug 'tshal lo// na mo d+harma k+Sha
215a5(rgyud 'grel): yI ma hA su khyA ye/ kye 'o gnyis meng+ge rdo rje 'di ltar nyon// gang zhig mig med pa yis lam mkhan+da bsten// 'u chung dpa' bo ma la rag lus te// me ling bston pas bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal// dang pa'i man
215a6(rgyud 'grel): yis chu dang 'o ma 'byed// bskal pa'i mun pa sel byed sgron me ste// gter gyi bang mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig mchog/ mi zad gter chen 'byin pa'i rgyal po bsten// dbul po bsten pas bdag nyid dbul por 'gyur//
215b1(rgyud 'grel): namakha' rgyu mtsho nyid zla gsum ldan bsten// ne tso'i kha thon snyan pas ci zhig phan// 'dab chags bu ni mkha' la sbyar na bde// dud 'gro g.yang la bsgyur na gson mi rung // nyi zla gaTA' bral sbyin pa rlung btab
215b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal// sprin sangs gyur kyang gzas zin snang ba med// chu skyes pad+ma'i bcud ni bung bas len// 'ang sbal drung na gnas kyang de lta min// chu shel chu ni rkyen dang 'jom pa ces// seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phe la par min//
215b3(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhU~M e ma hi// snang srid thams cad na mkha' nyid las byung // na mkha' yod med phyogs rgyu kha dog bral// thog ma bar dang tha ma 'gro 'ong med// 'byung bzhi rab tu 'khrugs kyang 'gyur mi srid// rkyen gyis
215b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar nig snang yang dkar nag med// rgya mtsho gting zlab rgya che sna tshogs 'char// rba rlabs ri bo 'dra yang rgya mtsho'i ngang // 'khyag rom brag 'dra chu las yongs ma 'das// sa la sna tshogs 'khrungs kyang zad pa myed//
215b5(rgyud 'grel): bsregs bcad bdar yang gser gyi ngo mi 'gyur// ming ni tsha zhing chu ni rlan mi 'bral// sprul pa drug ni rab tu rtogs par gyis// na mkha' stong las stong pa 'byung ba ste// rkyen gyis me chu 'byung yang shel gyi ngo mi
215b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// bka' rtags phyag rgya gnyug ma zhes brjod do// sa 'og gser dang gyad kyi nor bu dang // dbul po'i gter dang bum pa'i mar me ltos// nor bu rin chen mi gtsang 'dam du bring // sgyu mar ma shes
216a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po a byung chad// thag pa sbrul du mthong bas brgyal nas shi/ mar me nyi ma dmus lod myur par snang // mi gtsang dri zla can dan dri la 'bros// mig smon can gyis zla ba gnyisu mthong
216a2(rgyud 'grel): glang po bzhag nas glang po'i rjes tshol ba// bu chung me long gzugs brnyan mthong bas dga'// ri dgas 'khrul pa smig rgyu chu li steg/ gser ma shes bu rAg na phye ma 'chang / sgro chu glang rjes chu ni myur du
216a3(rgyud 'grel): skam/ rkyal med pa dag rgya mtshar zhugs na 'bying // lam mkhan med par dmun long lam 'gro dang // 'dab gshog med pa'i bye drug 'phur na ljang // dug lo bregs nas bsgyur kyang ci zhig phan// mun khung dag tu
216a4(rgyud 'grel): sgron ma btegs pas bsal// phag pa gcig tshong mdud pa brgya grol te// theg pa mes tshig dag gis 'ching mi nus// gser 'gyur rtsi yis zangs ljags gser du 'a gyur// rma bya ba tsan dug zos pas spu thog
216a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ mig dang ldan pas rkang pa gar gzhag phyin// dpung gi rgyal po gcig la 'dod dgu rdzogs// khyud phrugs gshog rdzogs mkha' la spur na bde// mar me bteg pas mun pa'i lam gsal zhing // cang shes sgrog
216a6(rgyud 'grel): tu bcug pa phye bas grol// ngang pa chu la 'o ma len pa ltos// dgra skugs btsal bas 'jigs pa sangs nas 'gro// nam mkha' ma mthong na mkha' mthong ba ste// rgya dang rgya'i 'bur ni log par 'byung // mar me bsad pas lus
216b1(rgyud 'grel): dang grib ma med// sgyu ma bshig pas 'du shes rnam lnga spangs// chu la chu bzhag de nyid dbyer myed 'gyur// nam mkha'i me tog ri bong rA zhes bya// gzings la 'phur ba'i bya ni slar la ldog/ gang zhig 'khyag rom spangs nas chu chol
216b2(rgyud 'grel): brgya rkyen rtsol bas byas pa rang 'byung min// dbul po mi nor rgya yis 'debs pa dang // sa bon 'bras bu tha dad 'dzin pa 'khrul// rkun mo ngos ma zin par ra mda' sbron// kye ma 'di ni sbrul dang rig sngags mtshon cha'adra// rta dza
216b3(rgyud 'grel): sbrul la mdud pa brgyab pa grol// mkha' la mdung bskor las zin skyes bu bde// khyung chen mkha' lding nyam nga 'dzugs pa med// ri mthon+ta kha na yul khams sna tshogs gsal// bu yi sdug bsngal ma yis mthong mi bzod//
216b4(rgyud 'grel): ral gril dar mas dngos po ma lus gcod// smyon par gyur kyang dug lo reg mi byed// bu chung yin yang gtsug gi nor mi 'bral// aHoM hUM/ e ma ho// me don gnyer bas du ba shugs kyis 'byung // nor bu rnyed na so nam
216b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ad mi dgos// mi gcig skyes pas shing la 'dod lnga 'byung / skyur po zos na mthong bas nyams su myong // sngar 'dres mi dang phrang na the tshom med// skyes bu na mkhas bzung ba thar mi srid// rmi lam sgyu ma'i mtshon gyis gnod
216b6(rgyud 'grel): pa med// dngul rdo 'o ma bur shing til mar ltos// chu ni mthong dang thos pas sgom mi sel// sman pa'i ngag mi nyan pa'i nad pa de// zas nor byin pas rang nyid bkres nas shi// gter mdzod bgrangs pas rang gi thob pa med//
217a1(rgyud 'grel): 'on pa sil snyan long ba ri mo mkhan// byis pa man gtam dmus long yul khams ston// sgo da ma yis ga ba nA byi phrug smin// rdo la gzhu brtul byas na rin chen nor// sdang ma munan nas bsings
217a2(rgyud 'grel): paswa gar chang 'byung // bu chung gsos pas dpa' bo'i las rnams nus// rgyal bu cher nas yul khams dbang thob ste// mkha' la sprin denges 'khyag pa chur thi me 'gyur// mkha' ldings rgyal po spro bsdu med par gnas
217a3(rgyud 'grel): chu ni ma rnyogs 'di dngas nyid du zhog/ ji ltar mkhas pra pa lang skyong ba bzhin// brtan gastsal rno ba mAr me'i snying po lto ste// sgyu ma'i skyos bu chags zhin rtsi s+ya gdab med// bya ni na mkhar rten med gnas par byed// chos
217a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyis ras gos dag par bkru// mkhyer sde rtsigs nas 'gram gzhi legs par thim// ma yi sdug bsngal bu yis ma thong bar gyis// yid bzhin nor bu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag/ na mkha' ltan 'ja'o tshon lus
217a5(rgyud 'grel): su bsgyur// dmu rgod rta ni thibs kyis zung la tshos// ri gzar 'bab chu yang yang brdabs nu drungs// spre'u zin na kun la yang rtswal sbyangs// bsags pa'i yo byad tshogs med kun la sbyin// bying zhing rmugs na 'dab cha
217a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la spur// yang na bum pa kha sbyor rlung gis khong/ rgod na khang stong rkun ma sprin la ltos// rgya mtsho'i rba rla bos chu zlar shes por bya// rkun ma mthong zhing tshor na ldog par nges// rtse ba sman na thams cang sman zhes bya
217b1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin chen sa yis gter du swa// yang na ri dgas gar song deng la gsod// ltogs na dugs la sngags kyis btab la bza'// snyoms las byis pa'i nyam nga g.yang sa ltos// snying la gces pa dur khrod gnas su sgrol/
217b2(rgyud 'grel): na tsha byung na rgyal pa stong par gyis// de la bu ga thos la mes tshig me la gdungs// sman ma zhu na slar yang nad du 'gyur// rtsa dang gser gnyis 'ching byed khyad par med// shes pa 'dzums na yul khams skor zhing blta/
217b3(rgyud 'grel): rkang 'gros bul na 'og rta rol la spos// dpa' rtsal zhan na dpa' rtsal kun la sbyang // me don gnyer bas gtsub shing drag tu bsrub// ri bo mi bskyod chu bo rgyun chad med// gser gling phyin nas sa rdo btsal mi rnyed// shring
217b4(rgyud 'grel): bal 'dab ma shin tu yang la sogs// yid bzhin nor bu yod na dgos 'dod 'byung // AHoM hUM/ e ma ho// bya 'phur na mkha' ngag las mi 'da' ste// sna tshogs nor bu tshon gyi kha dog snang // gser dang gser gyi rgyan
217b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba med// 'jam skyes pad+ma 'dam gyis mi gyis mi gos so// gang dag 'jigs swa skyel ma sengs nas 'gro// rgyal po gang zhig rgyal srid bor nas 'khyam// sum cu rtsa gsum thos pa ni tso'i chos// chu la mar khu
217b6(rgyud 'grel): blugs pas 'dre bar mi naM// bya rgod snyis zin glang chen 'dam du bying // nor bu rin chen lung khung dag tu bor// rgyal blon 'dzom na rgyal srid mnga' thang 'phel// mig dang rkang par ldan pas don sar phyin// dpa' bo'i
218a1(rgyud 'grel): go mtshon blon po bka' rtags khyer// rtsis med smyon pa zhen med bu chung dang // rtog med phag dang glang chen chur 'jug ltos// phag rgod rnams ni dug sbrul mi gtong za// dbul po rin chen rgyu la
218a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i mkhar du sba// gso sbyong spyad rnams rig pa mda' yis bsnun// yul khams kun gyi dgra rnams srid du bcang // dpa' bo gang yin de yis dgra rnams 'dul// mkha' lding rgyal po phye ldeb spyod yul min//
218a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ngan rgyal po wa yis seng pags gyon// nags la me me cheng gdong du gar bab sreg/ me 'bar ba la rlung gis bskyod na 'bar// rin chen stong sbyar phyis pa bsang // smyon pa bu chung khyi phag seng ge bzhin// a
218a4(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM/ e ma ho// chu rnams thams cad rgya mtsho chen por gcig/ gang zhig ltogs pa'i dus su zasra ster ba// nad rnams gso ba sman pa'i rgyal po sde// chu bo chen po sgrol ba'i mnyan po mchog/ gnod pa'i dgra rnas
218a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ste// dge bshes rgyal po phyogs med kun la snyoms// mkhas pa dag gis 'ja' tshon lta bar bya// gnang du bsnun pa'i tsher ba spongs pa med// bung ba me trog dag la rgyags zhen bral//
218a6(rgyud 'grel): nya ni rtags tu chu las yong mi 'da'// rtsi sman yod kyang dug le reg mi byed// ji ltar phyug po so nam byed pa ltos// seng ge'i 'o ma lkugs pa'i kha bzhin bsdams// smon pa rang gi snying la mtshon bsnun dang /
218b1(rgyud 'grel): gshed mas zin pa'i chang phyi'i chad pas bcad pa'i mi// sa bon rul ba myu gu yong mi skye// tshe lo sum cu nyi shu bcu pa bzhin// gang zhig ye shes nyi ma shar nas nub// dbul pos nor bu rin chen rnyed nas bor//
218b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag cang shes rta la zhon nas 'bab// ji ltar dbul po'i nor bu rgyal pos phrogs// yid bzhin nor bu mchod na dgos 'dod 'byung // dngul dkar me long yang yang phyis na gsal// brgya byin lha yi longs
218b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod 'bad pa med// me tog pad+ma bung ba'i tshogs rnams 'du// a oM hUM/ e ma ho// po ta la la nam langs nyi shar mnyam// 'jim pa'i logs la gtab pa'i bde gshegs sgo// myu gu me tog 'bras bu rim gyis
218b4(rgyud 'grel): smin/ dbang po skyon dang bral na gzugs rnams mthong // shel gong dri ma med pa phyi nang gsal// sgyu ma mkhasdu pa sprul pa sna tshogs ston// rdo rje pa lam gang gis gzhom par min// yid bzhin nor bus mi mthun gnod
218b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sel// seng gi mngal rgya khyung phrug sgreng rgya bral// mkha' la nyi shar 'od zer phyogs bcur khyab// srin bu bung ba gnas gyur mkha' la 'phyo// ying bzhin nor bu rtog med dgos 'dod 'byung // rang gi grib ma
218b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas 'bros pa dang // ri dwags smig rgyu rnyog pa nor ba ste// dgra la zin du mthong ni nges par gsod// 'khyag pa'i rang bzhin chu ru shos par byos// nyi zla'i ngos la 'char nub gsal 'grib med// rin
219a1(rgyud 'grel): chen byi dor byas na dgos 'dod 'byung // e maho// de ltar bstan pa'i don de thams cad kyang // rang bzhin las dang 'bras bu gsum du gnas// gzhi la chos sku lhun gyis grub pas na/
219a2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir sku gsum lhun gyis grub par gnas// rang bzhin stong pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo// lam ni mtshan med rnam par thar pa'i sgo// 'bras bla smon med rnam par thar pa'i sgo// sgo gsum phyed pas sku gsum zhal mthong
219a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'on kyang thams cad brdzun pa'i rang bzhin la// don la ched du bya ba ci yang med// shin tu gsang bya rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag/ khyod kyi ye shes rig pas rtogs par gyis// dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug dang // mkha'
219a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan dang // pad+ma'i spyan gyi zhal snga nas snying po'i don mgur du bzhengs pa phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu/ brda rgyud gsang ba'i sgron me rdzogs so// // rgya gar skadadu/ badz+ra gI ti/ bod skad
219a5(rgyud 'grel): du/ rdo rje'i glu/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par rtog pa'i gdon chen pos// zin par gyur pa'i smyon pa dag/ rdo shing sogs la gser du mthong // de la rIn chen gser yong min// rnam
219a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog gdon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// skad cig skad cig bcings par 'gyur// shes rab snying brtser bcas pa yin// de gzhom pa la 'bad par gyis// slob dpon po nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so// /
219b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ badz+ra g+hi ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje'i glu/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// rnam rtog sbrul gdug grayo can gyis/ zhen par gyur to rang gi sems// ji lta ji ltar rnam rtog grwa/
219b2(rgyud 'grel): de lta de ltar rnam par bcings// don med sdug bsngal mang po myong // 'khrul pa'i rje su 'brangs pa yis// 'khrul pa spongs par mi 'gyur te// dpa' bo snying rjer ldan pa yis// de bzhin nyid la goms par gyis// tri
219b3(rgyud 'grel): lha ji ltar rnam dpyad na// de lta de ltar rnam par bral// shes rab sbrul gdug mgo mangs kyis// bdag nyid la ni za bar byed// shes rab stsal gadrug mgro mangs ni// ting 'dzin 'om rtag tu gso// rtag ne'u le gsod par byeng/
219b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sbrul mgro brgya pa yis// nA ro pa lo rtag tu za// de nI su yis shes pa yin// nA ro pa ni nyid kyis shes// nA ro pa ni ny-id la bris// ma hA yo ga n+d+ha ra pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so// / rgyu gar skad du/ badz+ra gI ti/
219b5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du// rdo rje'i glu/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar na pa/ de ltar na khyod/ b+hu dang par byed pa rnam par rtog pa/ bad+mad rtsi'i rgya mtsho las sbrul 'ongs/ chom rnam par rtog pa/ rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so//
219b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra gI ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje'i glu/ dpal rdo rje gdan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// smra'o// nag po pa'i yid gang du yang mi gnas par thams cang tsa le col ler snang ngo // slob dpon nag po zhabs kyi
220a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu ra sid+d+hi sam b+h+ye d+ha hri dA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying po zhes bya ga/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// yang
220a2(rgyud 'grel): dag don rtogs sangs rgyas dang 'dra grub pa'i zhabs la gus btung nas// gang zhig sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi dge las kyi chu srin gyis// rab tu g.yengs shing khrid 'gyur de dag gdon phyir rnal 'byor dpa'
220a3(rgyud 'grel): bo yis// grub pa dag gi nyams myong rtogs pa'i lta ba phreng bar bsdeb par bya// gu ru lU yi pa'i zhal nas/ khyi rgod mi srun sna la sbrang rtsi bskus pas phyogs rnams kun tu za bar byed// de bzhin blo dman skal maun rnams
220a4(rgyud 'grel): la bla mra'i man drag byin pas rang rgyud bsregs// sbrul ldan skye med rtogs pa rnams ni snang btug phrad pa tsam gyis rnam rtog 'joms// dper na glang chen rab bstan myos pa'i sna la ral gri btags pas dgra nga pud 'dzem
220a5(rgyud 'grel): gu ru li lA pa'i zhal nas/ tshad med bzhi yi dgon pa ru// rnal 'byor rgyal po seng ge bzhin// mgo la g.yu mdog ral lngas brgyan// rnal 'byor dbang rtags rigs lnga 'chang // seng ge'i ster mo bcu dag gis//
220a6(rgyud 'grel): glang po la sogs sha rus 'byed// rnal 'byor pha rol phyin bcu yis// rnam rtog mi mthun phyogs rnams 'byed// li las de ltar rtogs nas grol// gu ru barba pa'i zhal nas// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang nas lhan cig
220b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa de// mi bsam mi rig bdag med rang gi ngang la bzhag/ chad par mi 'gyur nyams su myong bar rang gis rig/ rtag par mi 'gyur mngon zhen med pas zung ngu 'jug/ gu ru DoM b+hi ba'i zhal nas/ gAser 'gyur rtsi/
220b2(rgyud 'grel): yi nus pa yis// lcags rnams gser du sgyur ba ltar// rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis// nyon mongs gnyis med ye shes bsgyur// gu ru sha ba ri pa'i zhal nas/ ma rig pa yi nags tshul tu// bzung 'dzin gnyis kyi ri
220b3(rgyud 'grel): dgaso rgyu// thabs shes gnyis kyi gzhu brdungs nas// snying po don gyi mnga' gcig 'phangs// 'chi ni rnam par rtog pa 'chi// sha ni gnyis su med par zos// ro ni bde ba chen por myong // 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po thob/
220b4(rgyud 'grel): gu ru sa ri ha'i zhal nas// kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de// gzhan nas mi brnyed bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas rnyed // don dam zhal gyi ngo bo de rtogs na// yid la 'chi ba med cing lus la 'chang pa mang // gu ru kaM
220b5(rgyud 'grel): li'i zhal nas/ ji ltar na mkha'i stong pa la// gcig dang gcig gnyis spangs pa'i gzugs// rang snang ye shes btsun mo de// dpe med tha snyad kun las 'das// gu ru mi na pa'i zhal nas/ lcags kyu thogs pa'i nya
220b6(rgyud 'grel): ni las dbang rgya mtsho'i nang du khyer// nya chen lus la brten bcas nas// lha chen gdams ngag nyams blangs pas// yon tan sa dang rdo dag gis// ma theg min po zhes su grags// gu ru gau ra kha'i zhal nas/ rigs/
221a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rab dang 'bring dang thA ma ru// gnas pa'i rgyu la rkyen gyi stobs ldan pas// 'gag med las dbang 'bras bu ngo mtshar che// gtso rang gi la byams sems bsnyen bkur byas// de rkyen stobs kyi
221a2(rgyud 'grel): s+ya bon d+has// ma tsin d+ha yis 'chi meng bdud rtsi brtan// go ra khA lis gnyis med de nyid mthong // srid gsum baN+Di yi rgyal po ngo mtshar che// gu ru gtso rang gi'i zhal nas/ thog med srid pa yul ring du// ma rig/
221a3(rgyud 'grel): sdong po'i rtsa ba la// 'du byed chu yis legs brlan nas// srid pa'i yan lag sna tshogs rgyas// ma rig pa yi shing chen de// bla ma dam pa'i gdams dgra dang // shes rab gsum gyi sde'u yis// tso rang gi yis
221a4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcad// gu ru b+hi na ba'i zhalnga nus// phyin ci log la goms pa'i sgra// gus dang brtson pas dpyad byas nas// ma grol skye med sgra dpyad pas// b+hi na pa yis bdag med rtogs// gu ru shIn+ti pa'i zhal nas/ bu chung//
221a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yis gsos bA yis// g+had gyi stobs dang ldan pa bzhin// blo chung bla ma'i man ngag gis// rim gyi sA brid pas theg pa tshe// rlung khris bdag dkan 'dus pa yis// nang rnams sman gyis sel ba ltar// dra dang
221a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag tu 'dzin pa ni// bla ma'i gdams pas skad cig sreg/ gu ru tan+ti pa'i zhal nas/ 'jig rten pa yi thags mkhan rnams// snal ma thams cad thags su btags// nga yi bla ma'i man ngag gis// chos
221b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad thugs su btags// ye shes lnga yi stong nyid ni// snal ma man ngag stagaso dang // shes rab kyi ni sgrom bu yis// dbyings rig gnyis med chos skur btags// gu ru tsa ma ri pa'i zhal nas// rnam rtog
221b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i ko ba 'di// stong nyid rdo rje'i spangs nang du// chos brgyad spangs pa'i rgyun gyis ni// shes rab nyams myong brlung dang btsems// lhun grub chos sku'i lham byed pa// tsamA ri paM lham mkhan mchog/ gu ru kha Da ga
221b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal nas// 'jig rten pa yi mtshon thogs dpa' bo ni// rgyun bu dgra dang ga yul 'gyed kyang // bdag nyid sdug bsngal dbang du 'gyur// 'chi med ye shes ral gri yis// srid gsum dgra rnams pham byas nas// @
221b4(rgyud 'grel): DA ga pa ni longs spyod byed// gu ru nA gA rdzu na'i zhal nas// gang zhig ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste// byas na rgyal srid 'bangs kyis bzung ba bzhin// rtogs pas ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste// byas na glang chen 'dam
221b5(rgyud 'grel): zin pa 'dra// gu ru kah+ma pa'i zhal nas/ shing rta'i 'khor lo gcig kyang mi ldan khrid kyang 'gro bar mi nus ltar// sbyin sogs 'phad pa byas dang bla ma mi ldan dngos grub dam pa min// bya rgod rtsal rdzogs 'dab gsheg/
221b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dag ni ni mkha' gcod cing rgyug/ skal bzang rnal 'byor rnams ni dbang gi gdams ngag khong du chud pas bde// gu ru ka na ri pa'i zhal nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad ngo bo gcig/ de ni rtogs
222a1(rgyud 'grel): na rang bzhin rang gi sems// rtogs par 'dod na ma bcos ji bzhin zhog/ goms par byas na rnal 'byor mngon du 'gyur// gu ru tha kha na'i zhal nas// grang zhig rna bar chu zhugs na// chu nyid kyis ni
222a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa bzhin// de bzhin snang srid brdzun pa la// brdzun par bsgoms pas bden pa mthong // gu ru nA ro pa'i zhal nas/ 'khor los sgyur rgyal dpung tshogs rnams kyis ni// gling+ge dang gling phran rnams la dpung byed lcu
222a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan cig skyes pa'i ro 'gyur rnal 'byor ni// 'khor ba dbang sbyar bde ba chen po yin// gu ru sha la pa'i zhal nas/ legs byas ri mo mkhan ngag gis// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs brnyan bris// mthong
222a4(rgyud 'grel): ni byangag nyid 'jigs 'gyur la// brtags na ma grub gzugs brnyan smyung // gu ru tai lo pa'i zhal nas+dza// ri ra bya ngos la byA gnas pa// b+hA yi rang bzhin gser du snang // mkhas pa skye med rtogs pA yis//
222a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po bor nas bde ba che// ku ru tsa tra pa'i zhal nas/ rnal 'byor pa yis gud snang gdams pa yin// mthong ba skye med rtogs pa slob dpon mchog/ byis pa rnams kyi gnyis 'dzin rtog pa yin// dag
222a6(rgyud 'grel): dang sdig pa'i 'bras bu de la gnyis su 'byung // gu ru b+ha dra pa'i zhol nas// stong nyid don rtogs 'khrul pa zhi// byamos pa bsgoms pas spyod pa rdzogs// sna tshogs gnyis me goms pa yis// mi mthun
222b1(rgyud 'grel): ro gcig 'bras bur rtogs// gu ru d+ha khan d+ha'i zhal nas/ kun rdzob bskyed pa'i rim pa dang // don ngam rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis// zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por bsgoms// 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes 'char// gu ru
222b2(rgyud 'grel): dzo ka'i zhal nas/ bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis// steng sgo sna rtse thig ler bsgoms// de nyid la ni blo brtan pas// yul las dkar stong dmigs pra stor// gu ru ga la pa'i zhal nas/ 'gro ba 'di dag thog
222b3(rgyud 'grel): med dus nas 'khrul// de yis 'jig rten thams cad ma snyoms grags// bla ma'i gdams ngag bdud rtsi'i sman gyis ni// 'khrul pa'i nad rnams skad cig gcig la sreg/ gu ru DoM b+hi ba'i zhal nas/ yun ring dus
222b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dri ma 'khrud byas kyang // sol ba'i rang bzhin dkar por 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin rnam ngag stong nyid dag par 'gyur// bla ma'i gdams pa rang bzhin khrus mkhan mchog/ gu ru kaM ka ni zhal nas/ rtog
222b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yid bzhin nor bu la// nyams su myong ba'i mdog byung bas// spyod pa nus pas dgos 'dod 'byung // ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub// gu ru kam pa lo'i zhal nas/ rgya mtsho zab cing rgya che'i nang na
222b6(rgyud 'grel): nor bus gang bal// glu yi rgyal po rnams ni de la longs spyod ngo mtshar che// de bzhin snang grags thams cad ye nas chos sku yin pa la// rtogs pa dang ldan longs spyod ngo mtshar che// gu ru d+he ki pa'i zhal nas/
223a1(rgyud 'grel): rta dang glang po rgya mtsho 'dra na rab tu bde// spre'u byis pa chu yi ri mo 'dra na rtogs pa yin// chu bo nyi ma sman dang 'dra na dbyer mi phyed// gtsug phud mig dang 'khor lo lta shus 'bras bu thog/ gu
223a2(rgyud 'grel): ru b+han+d+halI zhal nus// mngon zhen med pa byams pa'i mchog/ gnas lugs rtogs pa snying rje yin// zag med bde ba dga' ba ste// chos rnams r-i cig btad stong rdzogs// gu ru ten ta na'i zhal nas/ ji ltar
223a3(rgyud 'grel): dran rig sna tshogs dag/ rtog med dbyings su zad cing 'gag/ de bzhin snang srid chos rnams kun// stong nyid dbyings su zad cing 'gag/ gu ru ku ku ri pa'i zhal nas/ sangs rgyas mchod sogs rnams
223a4(rgyud 'grel): la don mi 'byung // 'dod drang 'bar rtsol yod na sangs rgyas min// bla ma rim pa'i byin rlabs nyams myong dpal// cha ldan rang la yod kyang ma mthong ngo // gu ru ku tsi pa'i zhal nas/ gang la lhan cig skyes pa
223a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ glang po che yi mig bzhin du/ bze re bskyed na zug rngu 'byung // klong nas ma zhen bsna mo gtan mchog/ bla ma'i gsung gi 'od zer g+ni sa// yid dang med pa'i mtha' m+b+ha rlung // gang zhig ma rnyed de mtha'o// mtha'
223a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs na don gyi mchog/ gu ru d+ha ma'i zhal nas/ gnyis las ma rig dug ngag gis// rig pa skyes pa rgyun du zin// bla ma'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis// snang sring 'khrul pa'i dug nad sel// gu ru ma hi la'i
223b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal nA/ ma rig pa yi nga rgyal gyis// mya rtogs yid bzhin nor bu bsgribs// spyod par 'dod pas dgos 'dod 'byung // ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub// gu ru a tsin+d+ra'i zhal nas/ dmigs med phyag
223b2(rgyud 'grel): na po ru// 'khrul pa'i dran ying sna tshogs sbyor// yeng zhes rig pa'i snang ba os// gang snang phyag rgya chen por mthong // gu ru pa ha'i zhal nas// bde po bde bo dngos med ba de// zhen pa med pas dngos med bde//
223b3(rgyud 'grel): baurtags pa thams cad der shes bde// bsgrub pa med pa'i gsang ba bde// gu ru ni la na'i zhal nas// spyi bo'i 'dab ma 'dab skyes su// sa bon g.yo ba dga' ba ste// snying po'i 'byin pa mchog tu dgA/ lhan sdes dgra bral
223b4(rgyud 'grel): bla med thob// gu ru b+hU su ku'i zhal nas/ bdag nyid ma rtogs bar du rol khyad par che// de bzhin 'khor ba ngag dang sangs rgyas tha dad che// rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor 'das bde ba chen po ste// dper na rgyu
223b5(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i nang na 'bar ba'i rin chen bzhin// gu ru an+d+ri b+hU ti'i zhal nas/ dus kyi sna rtse dag ni byin rlabs dag dang mi ldan na// phyi dang nang du spyod pa dag gi rnal 'byor 'tshang mi rgyu// dga'i bde'i rang bzhin
223b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dag dang khyad par med pa ni// zhen pa bting na rang bzhin skyes pa nyams myong mchog tu dga'// gu ru me ko pa'i zhal nas/ bla ma daM pa dag las dang por rang gi sems rtogs bya// de nas snang ba
224a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu tha dad med bya skye// gnyis med goms pas dur khrod gnas su 'dug par bya// mnyam par rtogs nas skyon bu'i brtul zhugs spyod par bya// gu ru ko ta la'i zhal nas/ bde dang sdug
224a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad sems las byung // bla ma'i gdams pas sems kyi ri bo brkos// blo ldan sa yi ri bo berkos gyur kyang // gnyug ma'i bde ba chen po thob mi 'gyur// tha mal shes pa snying gi dbus su sang // cho ga
