354a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni// ljongs spyod 'khrig pa chags bac+doMs kyo// nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams// thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'o// de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i// las de nyid ni srid pa yin// nying
354a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin// tshor ba'i bar ni rba/ shi yin// 'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod lo// gtso bo'i phyir na yan lago bsgrags// sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la// rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro// nyon mong
354a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo las gnyis so// bzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin// gnyis kyi rgyu 'brus mdor bsdus pa// bar ma'i rje su dadag pa la/ 'di ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te/ byung ba 'bras bu nyid du 'dod// yan lag bcu gnyis de dag las//
354a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ni rnam lnga 'bras bu bdun// 'phen par byed dang 'phangs pa dang // mngon par 'grib byed grub pa dang // nyes dmigs kyis ni yan lag ste// gsum bzhi gsum gcig gcig rim bzhin// 'du byed sdug bsngal
354b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yis// sdug bsngal nyid ni rim bzhin du// lnga dang gnyis dang lnga yin no// khams gsum na ni rim bzhin du// bcu gnyis bcu gcig bcu yis 'jug/ brdzus skyes yan lag bcu gcig gis// mngal drang sgong skyes
354b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis kyis// drid gsher las skyes ci rigs 'jug/ de bzhin 'gro ba lnga la sbyar// gsum po drag las gnyis 'byung ste// gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang // gsum 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ste// nyid ni
354b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dang yang du 'khor// 'khor ba'i ngo bo rnam pa dang // gang zhig gang du gang gis dang // ji ltar dri srid nyes dmigs ni// mtha' yas tshogs kyis rab tu 'jug/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug
354b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yod par// chos 'dul 'od la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// mya
354b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan gang las 'da' ba dang // gang zhig gang gis gang gi tshe// gang du gang phyir ji lta bur// ji srid ngo bo rnam pa dang // thob bya dbye ba phrin las dang // yon tan tshegs kyis ldog pa'o// mu stegs pa ni rnam pa gnyis// sprul
354b6(rgyud 'grel): pa pa dang rang rgyud pa// de yang skye thob sbyor 'byung ngo // skye thob rigs chang log sreng can// sbyor byung bsam gtan rtog ge bo// bsam gtan pa ni mngon shes mthus// lta ba drug cu gnyis su rtogs// rtag par smra ba rnam bzhi dang /
355a1(rgyud 'grel): kha cig rtag par smra ba bzhi// mtha' yod sogs bzhi mi spong bzhi// rgyud med gnyis ni sngon mthar rtog/ 'du shes yong smra bcu drug dang // med smra brgyad dang de bzhin du// yong min med min smra ba brgyad//
355a2(rgyud 'grel): chad smra bdun dang tshe 'di la// mya ngan 'da' bar smra ba lnga// phyi ma'i mthar rtog lta ba'o// rtog ge pa ni grangs can sogs// tshad mas grub mtha' 'dzin pa'o// grangs can yon tan gsum du brjod// snying stobs rdul dang mun
355a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rangs dang mgu dang kun dga' dang // bde bzhi pa yo sems nyid dag/ res 'ga' yang ni snang gyur pa// de dag snying stobs yon tan no// mi dga' ba dang yongs bdud dang // mya ngan 'dod dang mi bzod dag/ gang du
355a4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i gtan tshogs kyis// de dag rdul gyis rtags su 'dod// rmongs pa de bzhin gti mug dang // bag med gnyid dang g.yel ba dag/ de dag mun pa'i yon tan no// yon tan gsum gyi rang bzhin mchog/ mthong ba
355a5(rgyud 'grel): lam du 'gyur ma yin// mthong ba'i lam du gang gyur pa// sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu gsog/ rang bzhin las ni chen po ste// de la sangs rgyal rnams su 'byung // de las dbang po bcu gcig dang // de tsam lnga'o de lnga lnga//
355a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba lnga ste nyi shu bzhi// gtso bo nyid dang rnam 'gyur ro// de dag sems pa yod ma yin// skyes bu kun rigs sems pa can// de dag nyi shu lngas shes na// ral pa'ang byi bo gtsug bud kyis// bsti gnas gang du
355b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba der// spel 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// bye brag pa ni don drug 'dod// rdzas dang yon tan las dang spyi// bye brag 'du ba rnam pa drug/ rdzas dgu yon tan nyi shu bzhi// las lnga spyi gnyis bye brag gnyis// de bzhin 'du ba
355b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ang rnam gnyis te// de nyid drug shes rig pa'i mchog/ rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin// gcer bu pa rnams don dgu smra// srog dang zag pa sdom pa dang // nges par rga dang 'chi ba dang // las dang sdig dang bsod nams dang // thar pa
355b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya don dgu po// gang gis mthong ste rnam par dag/ rigs pa can don bcu drug 'dod// tshang ma gzhal bya the tshom dang // dgos pa dpe dang grub mtha' dang // cha shas rtog gi gtan la dbab// rtsod dang rjod dung rgol ba dang /
355b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu skar snang ba'i tshig dor dang // ltag chod chad pa'i gnas rnams te// bcu drug gis ni nges par 'byung // spyod pa pa ni den bzhir brjod// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // de dag 'dus ma byas pa ste// rtag tu skye 'gag med par
355b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// de bas las 'bras yod ma yin// sngon dang phyi mtha' de bzhin med// gang zhig de ltar rnam dpyod pa// mthong ba tsam gyis rnam grol 'gyur// khyab 'jug byed rgyur smra ba rnams// nyi ma'i nang na khyab bdag 'jug
355b6(rgyud 'grel): skar nang 'od gnas zla ba yin// rlung nang ngani 'od zer tsa naM// snang ba can ni nyi ma yin// rig byed nang na snyan tshig dang // lha nang nga ni brgya byin te// dbang po'i nang na yid yin no// 'byung ba'i nang na sa yin zhing // nga ni bde byed drag
356a1(rgyud 'grel): po 'ang yin// srin po gnod sbyin nang rol bdag/ nor lha'i nang na me ltung // ri bo'i nang na nga ri rab// nga ni yi ge'i nang na a// nya dang rus sbal phag dang ni// me yis seng ge mi thung dang // dga' byed ra mA na
356a2(rgyud 'grel): nag po// sangs rgyas tsarti ka dang bcu// gang gis khyab 'jug yon tan rnams// rtag tu bsgoms na bde tho ba 'gyur// dbang phyug byed rgyur 'dod pa rnams// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad kyi// byed pa po ni dbang phyug yin// de ni
356a3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan brgyad dang ldan// rab phra yang ba mchod par 'os// bdag por gyur dang dbang du gyur// gar yang phyin dang 'dod dgur ldan// de bzhin dga' mgur gnas pa'o// lag pa dog dang rkang pa dang // mig dang
356a4(rgyud 'grel): gdong dang lus rnams kyi// mang po bskyed cing 'jig byed pas// des na phra rab brjod pa yin// mkha' dang rlung dang sra dang ni// chu dang me dag gnas byed cing // sdud pa dang ni rgyas byed pas// des na yang bar brjod pa/
356a5(rgyud 'grel): yin// 'jig rten gsum na mchod gyur cing // gnas pa dag dang rgyu ba dang // 'byung po kun gyis brjed pa na// des na mchod par 'os pa yin// 'obyung po kun la dbang byed cing // gnas pa dag dang rgyu ba dang // gang
356a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gang 'dod de byed pas// des na bdag po gyur ces bya// bdag li rag las rang dbang can// dga' la'ang 'jigs pa yod min te// thams cad dbang du gyur pos na// des na dbang du gyur ces bya// mtho ri
356b1(rgyud 'grel): ngan song kun khyab pas// des na gar yang phyin zhes bya// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa gsum// de dag gang la gnas gyur pa// mig 'byed tsam gyis byed gyur pas// des na 'dod du gur ldan zhes bya// thar pa 'ang yang na
356b2(rgyud 'grel): lha yis lus// gang du bdag nyid 'dod pa dag/ thams cad 'dod pas thob 'gyur pas// des na dga' dgur gnas shes bya// gong zhig phra gyur cig pu skyes nas 'dug/ de yis 'di kun skyes shing 'jig par
356b3(rgyud 'grel): byed// de ni dbang bdag mchog sbyin lce mchog bya// yon tan byed po shin tu zhi ba 'thob// skye ba po 'di shes pa yod min to// bdag gis bde sdug ba go la rang dbang med// dbang phyug gis btang yang na mtho
356b4(rgyud 'grel): ros sam// g.yang sa drag tu 'gro ba khro nar 'gyur// dbang phyug rdza mkhan lta buru sna tshogs 'di sprul byed por ma gyur na// ri rab 'di mi grub cing sa gzhi 'di min rgya mtsho 'dra ma yin te// nyi zla skar ldan 'di
356b5(rgyud 'grel): lhur bkod pa 'di dag mig yul du med 'gyur// yod pa'i phyir na dbang phyug 'gro ba'i byed po yin zhes 'ga' zhig smra// phra zhing bsam gyis mi khyab rab srab byed pa kun rig kun byed pa// rnal 'byor goms pas
356b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa blo can bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yul// nyi mo zla bas chu me rlung phyogs dang na mkha'i lus can te// zhi ba'i bde dga' 'dod pa rnams kyis dbang phyug rtag tu bsgoms// dus la bltos par smra ba
357a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// dngos kun dus kyi bsgyur ba ste// gang gi zhang po nor lnga dang // gang pha nor rgyus yin pa yi// 'jigs med khro bo 'ang bsang gyur pas// dus ni 'dra' bar dkar ba yin// 'byung ba rnams
357a2(rgyud 'grel): dus kyis 'byin// skye dgu rnams sdud dus kyis byed// dus kyi gnyid lo gsad par bang // dus ni 'da' bar bka' ba yin// bsrung ba gsum rtse 'obs ni rgya mtshe dang // dmag mi srin po nor ni nor sbyin sbyor// gang gI
357a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan bcos pa sangs tshad mnyam po'i// sgra sgrogs bu de'ang dus kyis dbang gis nyams// ngo bo nyid rgyur smra ba ni// dngos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// me yi dmar ba nyid dang ni// dam pa gzhan don byed nyid nga /
357a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum po ngo bo nyid kyis grub// tsher ma rnon par gyur pa su yis byas// ri dgas byA yi ri mo su yis byas// bu ram shing mngar nim+ba kha ba dag/ 'di dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis grub// nyi ma tsha zhing zla ra bo bsil ba dang /
357a5(rgyud 'grel): skye bo chags shing thub pa de min la// bde ba rab sil sdug bsngal rab gdung ba// drug po 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis grub// gang dag rgyu med smra ba ni// thams cad rgyal bltos med par// dngos po rnams ni skye ba ste// nyi ma pad+ma'i
357a6(rgyud 'grel): go sar sogs// sna tshogs gang gis byas pa yin// rma bya'i mdongs la sogs pa yang // sna tshogs gang gis sprul pa yin// ji ltar char rlung la sogs pa// glo bur 'byung phyir rgyu med ltar// sdug bsngal
357b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rgyu med nyid// shin tu rgya chen rab zab la// sgyid lug shin tu ma sbyangs la// bdug bzhin sgra dag gti mug gis// da ltar theg pa che la spyod// chu khrims las ni nyams bla yi// lha las cis kyang ma yin te// tshul
357b2(rgyud 'grel): khrims kyis ni mtho ris 'gro// lta bas go 'phang mchog tu 'gyur// gAti mug dbang gis bsgribs gyur te// gang zhig yang dgra bgegs byed pa// de la dge ba'i 'gro ba 'ang med// thar pa med pa smos ci dgos// gnod pa'i
357b3(rgyud 'grel): sa bom gyur pa yi// mu stegs byed mang mthong nas ni// thar 'did skye bo 'dod rnams la// snying rje mi 'gyur su zhig yod// de phyir thar pa don gnyer rnams// chos kyi dbyings su lta bar gyis// chos kyi dbyings su lta
357b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i glu// slob dpon chen po'i dI paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
357b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ u pa de sha gI ya pra dri pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ man ngag sku'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra bu'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyalnga ba'i sku ni gcig nyid la// gdul byi'i mos pa'i dbang gis ni// phyi
357b6(rgyud 'grel): nang gsang ba gsum du gnas// bde gshegs sprul pa sna tshogs ston// ya ba ni thabs kyis rang bzhin la// yum ni shes rab rang bzhin te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bo yin// las dang
358a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i dbang gis ni// la la zhi zhing la la khro// zhi bas phan par ma gyur na// khro bo de bzhin gshegs pas bstun// gdod nas dag pa'i snying po la// gzugs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// rang
358a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dngos po ma yin par// rang dbang can gyi sku nyid do// skye dang 'chi ba'i cho 'phrul rnams// sems can lta bu ma yin te// skye rga na 'chi rang gis shes// zhen pa rnams las 'da' tshul ston// skye dang 'chi ba mi dmigs pas// bag
358a3(rgyud 'grel): chags lus las grol gyur nas// rdo rje lta bu'i sku yin pas// bltas pa tsam gyis dri ma 'dag/ mtshan gzhi dri med me long la// mtshan bcas 'dzin med gzugs brnyan 'char// zung 'jug blo gros ngo bor rtogs// gnyug ma ngar
358a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan me long la// bcud dang rtsal sbyong gzugs brnyan 'char// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor rtog/ 'khor 'das bzhi me long la// 'gro ba drug gis gzugs brnyan 'char// bsgom du med pa'i ngo bor rtogs// shes rab gsum gyi me
358a5(rgyud 'grel): long la// yon tan mtha' dang gzugs brnyan 'char// yengasu med pa'i ngo bor rtogs// bcu gcig ldan pa'i dam pa la// brgyad dang ldan pa'i slob ma yis// zhabs kyi pad+mar rab tung nas// ma nyams gsum gyis mchod pa
358a6(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma// nges pa'i shes pa skyes gyur nas// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ni// ma 'dres gcig tu rtogs pa yis// dus 'di nyid la rdzogs sangs rgyas// man ngag sku'i sgrol ma rdzogs so//
358b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ yAn thA ka prA dI pA nA ma/ bod skad du/ theg pa gsung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum sems can ma lus kun// ma rig mun pas 'thibs pa la// ston pa bcom
358b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan shAka thub kyis// gsung gro ston ma 'di bstan pas// dam chos rim pa gsus du gsungs// rgyas par gsung dang 'bring du bshad// bsdus pa'i don du bstan pa'o// de la rgyas par gsungs pA ni// dug gsum nyon mongs chu mnyam
358b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// gnyen po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste// theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o// 'bring ni gsung rab bcu gnyis dang // mdo dang dbyangs bstad lung bstan dang // tshigs bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi dang // rtogs brjod de byung skyes pa'i
358b4(rgyud 'grel): rabs// rgyas dang rmad byung gtan la dbab// bsdus pas sde snod gsum dag ste// mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon no// lta bo gtsor ston mngon pa ste// bsgom pa gtsor ston mdo sde yin// spyod pa gtsor ston 'dul ba'o// de
358b5(rgyud 'grel): yang rnam pa gsum yin te// tshe dang chung dang khyad par ro// dang po lnga ni mdo yin te// de rjes drug ni 'dul ba yin// nangs kyis tha ma mngon pa'o// de ni theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung // rgyas dang rmad byung mdo yin te// mdo sogs
358b6(rgyud 'grel): dgu ni 'dul ba la// gtan la dbab pa mngon pa'i sde// de ni theg pa chen po'i gzhung // mdo sogs rim lnga don yin te// de rjes rnam bzhi 'dul ba la// tha ma gsum ni mngon pa'o// de ni khyad par bla med gzhung // de bzhin sbyor
359a1(rgyud 'grel): bshes par bya// byud par dbang du byas nus ni// mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa dang // 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o// de gnyis rgyu 'bras khyad par yang // don cig la yang ma rmongs te// thabs mang dka'
359a2(rgyud 'grel): bla med pa yis// dbang po rnan pos dbang byas te// pha rol phyin pa'i theg pa pas// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// sngags la rgyud sde bzhir gsungs te// bya ba'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor rgyud pang bla med
359a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya min rnal 'byor do ltag la// rab la rnal 'byor tha med do// yang na mi rigs bzhi las ni// bram ze'i rigs la bya ba'i rgyud// dmangs rigs la ni spyod pa yi// de bzhin rje'u rigs
359a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rgyud// rgyal rigs rnal 'byor bla med do// 'di ni bla med rgyud du grags// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu las// 'di ni thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// zab tsong rgya che'i zhi byed 'di// rgyud pa rnam pa bzhi ru bshad//
359a5(rgyud 'grel): rig gi rgyud dang don gyi brgyud// byin brlabs brgyud dang brda yi brgyud// ma zhugs rnam bzhi shes par bya// theg pa gsung gi sgron ma rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ sa mya dar pra dI pa nA ma/
359a6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba// 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// lhan skyes ye shes ster mdzad pa// dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud// mtshan chod lta ba ma 'gags
359b1(rgyud 'grel): pas// grub mtha' kun dang phyogs gcig mthun// yin lugs lta ba mtha' dang bral// grub mtha' kun gyi zo ma shor// lta ba rgya che mtha' bral ni// mtha' bzhi'i skyon dang bral bas nA// grub mtha' kun la mi gnas
359b2(rgyud 'grel): pas// yang dag lta bar yid ches bya// blta bya blta byed gnyis dang bral// lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni// lta ba'i dam pa kho na yin// dngos 'dzin lta ba kun las grol// ma rig pa yi mig phye nas// ye shes mig gis
359b3(rgyud 'grel): bltas pas ni// rig pa dri ma med pa lta// dri mod mthong zhes lta ba yin// mthong bya mthong byed gnyis bral nas// zung 'jug lta ba gza' gtad med// phyag rgya chen po lta mchog yin// de nyid rtog pa'i yon tan
359b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// mtshan nyid bzhi ru shes par bya// rig pa dri ma med pa la// rnam dag sgrib grayogs med pas na// gzung 'dzin g.ya' yis ma gos pa'o// gcig gi sangs rgyas e ma'o// rig pa gtser bur gnas
359b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la// mtshan ma'i gros kyis ma g.yogs par// rang 'byung ye shes drag po che// chags sdang mtshan mya ma bzhin sreg/ kun shes rig pa rten med pa'o// bag chags sbubs su ma zhugs par// sdug bsngal
359b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khar pa gzugs mi dgos// 'dod yon so nam rang sar grol// 'dzin med rig pa brlings pa ni// dngos 'dzin yu ba bud pas na// snang grangs 'dzin pa nus pa yin// phyogs cha med pa'i blta ba'o//
360a1(rgyud 'grel): yang drag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs / rgya gar skad du/ ra ta na b+hA ba dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin po che sgom pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag
360a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa// dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud// dang po zin par bya ba dang // par du brten paru bya ba gcis// tha ma bigs kyi sde dbyung thabs so// mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang /
360a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang // rtags dang nyams myong yon tan dang // tshad dang skyon dang bcos thobs so// ma zin zin par byed pa la// lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i nang // rlung gi gnang ni shes par bya// zin
360a4(rgyud 'grel): pa brtan par byed 'dod na// rtsal sbyong gsum la mkhas par bya// brtan pa grong du bogs 'byin na// bogs 'byin gsum la goms par bya// mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob la// dza sprid bzhi bzhir shes par bya// dang
360a5(rgyud 'grel): bo mnyam gzhog ngo spyod ni// rig po mtha' rkyang ngar dang chas// no mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon// rig pa tha sh+ya gcod pa ni// gzhu bzangs gdungs pa'i dpe yis mtshon// de nas reg pa rtsal sbyang ni// dar tshon rlung
360a6(rgyud 'grel): sa spyod pas mtshon// rig pa rjen par gzhog pa ni// gtsug ma lta bu'i dpes yis mtshon// rjes thob la yang ngo spod bzhi// mnyam gzhag rjes theb med par spang // rkyen la drag zhan med par sprid// dbang po thogs
360b1(rgyud 'grel): rdugs med par spyad// rang bzhin gsal ba dri med yin// mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba'o// rtags la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// btang na 'gro la gzhag na stong // dgos pa'i dus su snyegs pa dang // shes bzhin
360b2(rgyud 'grel): gnang du chud pa'o// nyams myong la yang de bzhin te// bde ba dang ni gsal ba dang // mi rtog pa dang mi g.yo bya'o// yon tan mngon par shes pa 'char// ched ni rtsa ba brtan pa dang // de bzhin rtse me rno ba nyid// bar ni
360b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba ngar dang chas// dmig pa sna tshogs sbyar shes pa'o// skyon ni bying drang rmugs pa dang // de bzhin rgod dang g.yeng ba'o// bcos pa la yang rnam gsum ste// rin chen gser ltar bcos pa dang //
360b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzud snyan pa lta bu dang // bi shwa kar ma'i bzo bzhin no// man ngag bsgom pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ sa ma tA wa stu pra dI pA nA ma/ bod skad du/ mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron
360b5(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// rang snang me long ston mdzad pa// dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud// gzhi la rnam pa gnyis yin te// spyi yi gzhi dang bye brag gzhi// spyin
360b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su lung ma bstan// gzhi nyid ming 'dogs bral ba yin// dper na gi pur sman bzhin no// ma bcos khas len bral ba yin// nus pa sna tshogs 'char bas na// gzhi nyid shes pa'i nus pa yin// sangs rgyas
361a1(rgyud 'grel): sku dang ye shes 'byung // de ma rtogs pa'i sems can ni// lus dang bag chags gnyis su snang // bye brag bzhi la gnyis yin te// 'khor ba'i gzhi dang 'das pa'o// 'khor ba'i mtshan
361a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'dus byas pa// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pas na// snod dang bcud ni mi rtag ste// dus bzhi la sogs 'gyur bas ni// de mi shes pas yang yang 'khor// 'das pa'i gzhi la gnyis yin te// dran pa bzhi yi/
361a3(rgyud 'grel): ngos bzung lo// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab bo// thabs shes gnyis kyis gtan la dbab// A li thabs kyi rang bzhin la// kA li shes rab rang bzhin no// skye med mtshon pas a zhes bya// 'gag med mtshan
361a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ka yin no// r-i r-i le l-I zung 'jug go/ zla ba dang ni nyi ma gnyis// g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya'o// des nas dus tshong 'pho ba dang // chu tshod dbyug gu skad cig dang // lte ba dung ni snying ka dang // mgrin
361a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang nI spyi bo dang // 'khor lo bzhi ru shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang phyi nang gnyis// ro snoms ma zhu shes par bya// phyi rlung gnyis su gnas pa la// rten 'brel chos rnams ma shes na// sangs rgyas chos
361a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams mi shes so// lte bar a gnas gsang bar spro// stong kha ra raM gnas 'bar ba ni// mgrin par hri las gsol ba ni// spyi bor haM du bsgom par bya// bde stong gnyis su gsal bas ni// mtshon par
361b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po yin// snong dang sbyor dang sbyar dang grol// zang dang 'phen dang tshig dang don// sde sngo gsum gyi don yang ston// dus tshod 'byung ba bzhi yis mtshon// ma nor ba ru shes par bya// sde tshan lnga yis nang
361b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'joms// A li kA li mgrin par gnas// na mkha'i yi ge nga rgyal 'joms// tse yi sde tshan rkan las 'byung // me yi yi ges zhe sdang 'joms// Ta yi sde tshan lce las byung // rlung gri yi ges
361b3(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog 'joms// ta yi sde tshanu se nas 'byung // sa yi yi ges gti mug 'joms// pa yi sde chen mchu nas 'byung // chu yis yi ges 'dod chags 'joms// hUM gi 'og gis rlung rnams sdus// oM yis steng gi
361b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba gsal// ha yis bde ba 'phel bar byed// hi ka gis bde ba gnas nas 'dren// phyi nas 'byung ba'i dgra bshed dang // nang nas 'byung ba'i ro snyoms dang // phyi yi dus tshod g.yon nas bzung // nang gi dus tshod g.yas
361b5(rgyud 'grel): nas gzung // lo yi mgo bo byi ba yin// zla ba'i mgo bo stag yin pas// lha dang byang dang shar dang nub// 'byung ba bzhi ru shes par byas// shes na thams cad 'grub par nges// tshig cig snyan pas sangs rgyas dang // rdzas
361b6(rgyud 'grel): cig rnyed pas don yod 'grub// sdug gcig bzlas pas nus pa 'byung // mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ko To ni ny+dza pha la dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ mthar thug 'bras
362a1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i chu las sgrol mdzad pa// dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud// sgrub pa'i chos la don yod pas// dam pas gsungs
362a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yid ches gyis// mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma ni// rnam pa gnyis su shes por bya// gnas skabs rgyu yi 'bras bu dang // mthar thug rtog pa'i 'bras bu'o// rgyu 'thun 'bras bu mi stor bas// byas pa'i chos la nAn tan skying //
362a3(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' rdo rje grong 'jug gsum// las su rung ba'i 'bras bu yin// rtog pa'i 'bras bu sku lnga ste// ngo bo stong pa tshe sku la// rang bzhin gsal ba longs sku yin// mtshan nyid nyams myong sprul pa'i sku// zung 'jug ngo bo nyid kyi sku//
362a4(rgyud 'grel): rang grol rang dag bde chen sku// don la mtshon du ci yang med// tha snyad blo la rgyu 'bras gnyis// zhen pa bzlog phyir bstan pa las// don dam brjod du med pas na// rgyal bas tshig gcig gsungs pa med// mthar thug 'bras
362a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shris mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ho d+hi tsar+ya pra dI baM nA ma/ bod skad du/ byang chub spyod pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge
362a6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gdungs pa la// zhi byed bsil ldan dri med bshad// 'jig rten khams 'di mi rtag ste// dper na 'dza'
362b1(rgyud 'grel): tshon yal dang 'dra// lo zla tshes grangs 'chi dang nye// bu tsha la sogs grogs rnams dang // bor nas gcig pu 'gro dgos na// bAr dro bzhi las 'chi ba'i tshe// sdug bsngal ri bos mnan pas sdug/ bdun mo bdun du bar do ru//
362b2(rgyud 'grel): gshed pos 'chi zhing sdug re bsngal// ma rig 'khrul pas lus blangs te// nyon mongs lnga yi sems kyang dkrugs// dper na shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin// 'gro ba drug gis sdug bsngal myong // sdig bsngal bzhi sogs sdug
362b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bas// de phyir byang chub bsgrub par bya// le lo g.yeng ba rab spangs te// shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs la// rtag tu dur khrod gnas su 'dug/ dran pa bzhi dang ldan pa yis// tho rangs langs ta khrus byas la// ngad dang
362b4(rgyud 'grel): mos gus sngon btang ste// byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas// 'gro ba bu bzhin gdung bar bya// gsum la skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya// bden pa'i chos la the tshom spang // 'dod pa spel phyir chu skyon gtang // mchod
362b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs la sogs kha don bya// gru yi tshul du lus kyang btsal// bag yod spyod lam blo gros zab// lha dang mi 'bral bsam po bzang // dang po byung bas dkon mchog mchod// kha zas kun la rnal 'byor bya//
362b6(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma 'byung po rnams la bsngo// gshang tse rnams kyang sbyin par gtang // smon lam rgya chen gdab pa'o// chos su 'gro ba'i tshig kyang brjod// tsha tshe gang ba cing srog kyang gdon// bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus
363a1(rgyud 'grel): bsags// ye shes tshogs kyang de bzhin te// sdom pa gsum dang ldan par bya// pha rol phyin pa drug spyad de// dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bya// bskor ba bya zhing lus kyang bcag/ 'byung ba bzhi
363a2(rgyud 'grel): ni ro bskyams te// mtshan mo nang gi spyod pa bya// srod la gtor tshogs chen po gtang // nam phyed tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskur// phyi bcud nang bcud rang sor gzhag/ nom smad dge bo'i gnyid kyang log/ spyod lam rnam
363a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i chos la bsdu// ma yengs chu bo'i rgyun ltar spyad// sgyu lus 'od gsal sre ba yang // sum cu rtsa bzhi'i gdams pa'i don// sems nyid las su rung bas ni// rang dbang rgyal po sems la thob// de phyir rnal 'byor
363a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson par spyad// byang chub spyod pa'i sgron mi zhes bya ba rje brdzun ka ma la shris mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta kha tshe dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / ong po lo ts+tsha pas bsgyur ba'o// / dge
363a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ pA da yo ga pro d+hi pAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor lam gyi sgrol ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i steng ga la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron mi 'di// snun pas logs pa'i lam mi
363a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad pa// dam pa skyes mchog de la 'dad// A li kaM la'i sgra don rtogs// sde snod gsum gyi don yang shes// bad gi dang skye 'gro'o sems can rnams// e nas skye med 'od
363b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal yang // ma rig pa yi rlung gis 'khrul// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong // de la grol bar bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor lam pas 'di ltar bya// sdig pa'i las rnams rab spangs te// dge ba'i chos la brtson par bya//
363b2(rgyud 'grel): dka' la som nyi mi za zhing // rtag tu skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya// byams pa'i sems dang rab ldan zhing // 'gro la snying rje ci nos bya// 'dod yon dngos po mi rtag pas// gzung 'dzin chags sems rnam par spangs/
363b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la smad par ma bya zhing // 'gro ba'i bla ma spyi bor bkur// log pa'i lam du mi 'jug cing // mthu dang ngan sngags spel mau bya// longs spyod 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te// gcig pa nags su 'dug la sgom// 'jig rten
363b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chal tshig mi brjod par// sngags dang snying po mdo yang brjod// yang na lkugs pa'i tshul du bsdang // rang byung dri ma med pa'i brda// lus la gru yi blo bzhan la// bcud len gyis ni zungs kyang bskyed// gtu mo yos ni ro bsnyams
363b5(rgyud 'grel): te// 'byung ba bsnyams zhing nad rnams dbyung // gnod sbyin par chad pa byed la// brtu lnga zhugs gdams pa'i spyod pa bya// mi nga la gsum dang 'du ba gsum// 'khor lo gsum dang rtsa ba gsum// 'bar ba gsum dang
363b6(rgyud 'grel): chud mi za// thim pa gsum dang rgyas gdab bo// mdor na thams cad sems yin te// sems las ma gtogs tshos gzhan meng // sems su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo// blo las grol na gnyis su med// gnyug ma'i
364a1(rgyud 'grel): ngang las ma g.yengs par// dngos spyor snang bar sgyu mar blta// sgyu ma brdzun pa rmi lam tshul// rmi lam tshul sogs rab shes nas// dpe brgyad bzhin du shes par bya// rnal ma'i chos la rab
364a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas na// gang ltar spyad kyang bde ba thob// des na rnal 'byor brtson par buM// rnal 'byor lam gyi sgrol ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad dro/ tsit+ta gu h+ya pra tI paM nA ma/
364a3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ gsang po'i thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng gau la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa lnga bcu rtsa lnga yis// zhabs kyi pad+mar rab btud nas// sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// khyad par
364a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis gdamyas pa bstan// kye ma rnam shres rlung gis 'khrug/ rlung nI las su rung ba dang // gtum mo rlung gis sbyor bar bya// 'du ba'i nad kyang rlung gis bcos// 'byung ba ro ni mnyam pa dang // btulo zhug
364a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas bar chod sel// 'tsha ba'i bcud ni len pa dang // oM paM bde ba'i rlung gis bskyed // rten 'brel shes pa 'char ba dang // rdo rje rkeng mgyogs grub par 'gyur// d+hU tir tshud de phyag rgya che// 'de ba ldan pad+ma gi
364a6(rgyud 'grel): sor dbus// rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// chagaso dang 'bri ba bcu gnyis brgya// la la ra sa d+hu tir bsdu// rlung dang byang chub sem kyang de// 'khor lo bzhi la srog shing tshul//
364b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dra spar ba swa haM las 'dzag/ bcu drug phyed phyed thig le ni// bskyil dang bzlog dang dgram zhing bstim// dga' bzhi'i khyad par phyag rgya che// skye ba dang ni 'gag pa'o// shes pa kho na 'bra' zhig yin// sems ni
364b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sa bon te// rang sems rtogs na songs rgyas la// bde ba gzhan du mi btsal lo// sems nyid las su rung ba dang // rnam par mi rtog yang dag don// gnyis med gnyis su med pa las// gnyis su
364b3(rgyud 'grel): byar med spros bral mkha'// srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// don gyis dbu ma phyag rgya che// snying po'o don lasaHyengs par// gnyug ma'i yid ni gcig tu gtad// rnal ma'i don la rab gnas
364b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// yid la mi byed bde ba che// lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro// mtshon du yod po ma yin te// stena? ka'i zla ltar dri med 'od// bde gsal stong pa'i ye shes can// rang la sbas pa mig ltar dbye// bde
364b5(rgyud 'grel): ba che las gzhan med pas// phyag rgyu'i mchog de phyag rgya che// sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang // lus sems 'phen du gzhug pa dang // 'bras bu blo yis ma grub pa// shes rgyud na mkhar 'pha pa dang //
364b6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa sna tshogs bsgyur shaus so// chos dang chos mauni sel ba dang // rig pa dngos snyigs dbye ba dang // rnam shes rlung yang bstim pa'o// sgra lus 'od gsal bsre bar bya// bag chags sbubs
365a1(rgyud 'grel): su grol ba dang // phyag rgya chen po dus 'dir thob// des na rnal 'byor brtson par bya// sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ka ma
365a2(rgyud 'grel): la shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba l-I btsun chung gis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ maN+Da lA bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/
365a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// bla mya mnyes par byed pa yi// maN+Dal cho ga bshad par bya// maN+Dal la ni rnam lnga ste// ngo bo ngos tshig dbul thabs dang // dbye
365a4(rgyud 'grel): bo dang ni phan yon no// ngo bo dbul bar 'os pa lnga// sngags dang rdzas su bcas pa'o// maN+Da ni skye pa'i sa bon te// bsod nams 'phel-i bas DA la zhes bya// dbul thabs dang gus mos pa yis// gong maM
365a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byed pa'o// maN+Dal dbye bas rnam gnyis te// dngos dang yid kyis bsam pa'o// yid ni las su rung bya ste// dran pa tsam gyis gsol ba'o// dngos la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// dbul ba
365a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni sgrub pa dang // mchod pa dang ni mdzes pa'o// sa yang rung ste gzhi la ni// gang yang tshad dang ldan pa la// oM badz+ra ya Sha ka hUM// zhes pa de yis byug par bya// rnam pa nyi shu dgram bya ste// haM las
365b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi ri rab bsam// rang gi ngos kyi shwar byas pa'i ya lus shar gyis lus 'phags bsams// ra las byang gi sgra mi snyan// la las lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling // sha las nub kyis ba lang spyod// yaM
365b2(rgyud 'grel): las byang shar mtshams su bsam// gling gi yog nyi shu byed nA yang // g.yas g.yon sngags kyang de bzhin no// ri las nub byang gling phran bsam// shaM lus lho nub mtshams yin no// lAM las lho shar
365b3(rgyud 'grel): gling phran bsam// tsa las btsun mo rin po che// tshwa las blon po rin po che// dza las dmag dpon rin po che// l+la las glang po rin po che// tsamA lngas rta mchog rin po che// tsham las 'khor lo rin po che// dza ma las
365b4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin po che// wa las gter chen rin po che// maM las nyi ma shar du bsam// a las zla ba nub tu'o// oM las steng gi ri rab bo// gling bzhi gling phran bcas pa dang // rin chen bdun dang gter dang brgyad // ri rab
365b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi zlar bcas pa rnams// bla ma dang ni dkon mchog gsum// yi dam+ba mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i 'os// dad pa'i stobs kyis 'bul lcags kyis// bla ma dkon mchog bzhis su gsol// mAN+Dal phul ba'i yon
365b6(rgyud 'grel): tan no// maN+Dal gcig phul drug dang ldan// bsod nams tshogs ni bsam mi khyab// des na de la brtson par ba// gcig phul yon tan drug dang ldan// gling bzhi phul ba'i yon tan gyis// bdud bzhi ma
366a1(rgyud 'grel): lus zhi bar 'gyur// gling phran pa'i yon tan gyis// tshad med bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur// rin chen sna bdun phul bA yis// 'phags pa'i nor bdun thob par 'gyur// gter chen phul
366a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yon tan gyis// mi zad longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// nyi zla phul ba'i yon tan gyis// lte bsgoms sems la gsal bar 'gyur// ri rab phul ba'i yon tan gyis// rang 'byung ye shes thob par 'gyur//
366a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal dbul ba'i cho ga rje btsun+da ka ma lo shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu dra tadA tra nAk+Sha ro pa de sha/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man
366a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// grub thob dam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las// skyes bu khyad par rig 'dzin lnga yi gzhung // mchog gyur rnaMs kyi zhab kyi rdul la reg/ de phyir dpe bral phyag rgya chen po bshA
366a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam gcod dang ni yongs gcod dang // phung po gsum pa sel ba dang // don dam 'jal ba'i tshad ma yi so// yang dag yid la blta bar bya// yang dag don la yi ge med// gang gis yi ge med shes po// de yis yi
366a6(rgyud 'grel): ge thams cad shes// yi ge a nas kA la rdzogs// sde mtshan brgyad kyi sgra sbyor ni// A li kA lir shes par bya// ma skyes pa dang mi 'gag pa// zung 'jug mtha' bzhi bral ba yi// bde ba chen po rgyun chagasu/
366b1(rgyud 'grel): tha ma'i brda yis mtshon par bya// kha don mar me me long rgya// me shel sa bon sbyar dang sgra// brgyad pa 'di ru don bsdus pa// go ba cig shos skye bar 'gyur// in+d+ra b+hu ti bdag med ma// lhan cig skyes sbyor 'dod yon grol//
366b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bden don rtog pa 'phags pa lta// srog rtsol ba nAM gA pa// phyi nang rlung gsum tshangs par 'dren// kha sbyor thig le pad+mar byung // bde bas rgyas pa'i za ma tog/ sku gsum mnyam gzhag mda'
366b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnun na// dran med skyed med blo las 'das// mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang // rmi lam dang ni bar do la// zin dang brtan dang bogs 'obyin pa// rgyas gdab pa dang rnam pa bzhi// dang po dus bzhi mnyam sbyar la// gnad gsuM
366b4(rgyud 'grel): zer bzhi gdab par bya// lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i gnad// rlung gi gnad ni shes par bya// rig pa bcur la gdab pa dang // shes po srang du gzhug pa dang // sems ni rus dmigs na pa dang // rten dang dpral zhing
366b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa gces// aM baM brgyan pa'i bde ba la// bde bas byang chub lam du kyer// snang srid brda ru spong ba dang // gang mthong phyag rgya chen por shar// thams cad ro mnyam de bzhin nyid// gcig zos pa yis gzhan kun grol// /
366b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du// rnal 'byor ma yangs rgyun du bsgom// gzung ba dang ni sbyang ba dang // sgyu ma dang ni kho na nyid// nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las// rmi lam man ngag shes par bya// da lta 'chi kha
367a1(rgyud 'grel): bar ngo la// rten dang 'od dang thig le sems// grong 'pho'i man ngag shes pa yis// bde ba can du de 'gro'o// don mthong ba yis sgro 'dogs chod// nyams su blangs na byin brlabs 'byung // drod
367a2(rgyud 'grel): rtags nus pa tshod zin pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o// rlung 'khris bad kun 'dus pa'i nang // mtshon dang 'tshe ba 'byung ba 'khrugs// dal yams 'brum po chu ser la// ting 'dzin me btsa lo skyugs kyis zhi/
367a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang mu stegs cho 'phrul gtong // gdon dang 'byung po bshugs pa 'dren// gnod sbyin 'khru ldog byed pa'i tshe// mi g.yo rgyu mtsho lta bu bzhag/ me dang chu dang dug sbrul dang // bsre dang tshom rkun rgyal po'i chad//
367a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag dang dreng mo can zan khro// de tsho nga yis 'dod pa yin// rgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang // dol dang drag dong shin tu drag/ zang zong longs spyod mang po la// sbyor ba 'di yaus khyab na bde// ro snyoms gtum mo
367a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod dang // sman dang bcud len bdud rtsi brten// ro langs mkha' 'gro dngos grub ster// blang ngor med pa'i sems kyis 'bad// mthor rgyus gnyis kyis shan phye la// khAr phog car phog thog babs su/
367a6(rgyud 'grel): thun dang bcud kyis rtsal sbyangs te// snang gsum sbyor ba skad pa'i phyir// dbang po gsum gyis dam mi 'da'// ma 'khrul gsum gyis so thub ste// srog 'dzin gsum gyis brtan pa 'thob// grol lugs
367b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis tshad bstan no// la zla gsum gyis zad sngar bskyal// 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'khor bar bying ba la// ma rig mig 'byed 'di bkod pas// phyi nang gsang ba kho na nyid rtogs te// kun gyis phyag rgya chen po thob
367b2(rgyud 'grel): par shog/ de kho na nyid phyug rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po kau ma la shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / zhu chen gyi l-i tsA ba bla ma la
367b3(rgyud 'grel): btsun chung gis bsgyur tsing zhus te btan la phab pa'o// 6/ rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo//
367b4(rgyud 'grel): yum gyi sgrub pa bshad par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i// gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa// zhal gtsogaM phyag ni gnyis pa ste// sku mdog dka ri zhing yid 'ong ma//
367b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra bcings pa la chung zhig 'phyang // chu skyes dkar l-i legs gnas pa// phyag g.yas su ni pad+ma ste// kha dog dmar ba'i rnam par bsgoms// shes rab pha rolnga phyin pa g.yon// rdo rje skyil krung legs par
367b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas// rgyan kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// a yig yi ge la zhugs shing // mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o// dam tshig sems dpa' rnam bskyed la// ye shes sems
368a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnam par bsgom// zla ba drug gi sbyor ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gyur// mtshan ma bdun gyi sbyor ba yis// bstan bcos kun la mkhas par 'gyur// zla ba shar ba'i rim
368a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni// zla ba phyed ni bsgom par bya// bzlas pa 'bum byas sbyor b+h+r-i yIs// nyin re bzhin du tshigs bcad brgya// 'bad pa med par sbyor po 'byung // gzhung yang brgya tsam 'dzin par 'gyur// de la sngags ni 'di
368a3(rgyud 'grel): yin te// oM pi nr-i pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nau/ dz+wa lA dz+wa lA me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+hi bar+t+ta ni sA hA/ bya rog gi skad mi grag par sngags 'di lan bdun du mngon par sngags par byas nas/ me rlangs pa'i beskyur po'i khu
368a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'thungs na zla ba drug du gang 'thung bar byed pa de shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ka ma la shrIs mdzad po rdzogs so// /
368a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA tA ru sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ N+De btsun mya 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrubs thabs/ smra ba'i seng ge lo phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes dri med sgrol ma gasngal ba'i thugs// smra bsam brjod med shes
368a6(rgyud 'grel): rab phar phyin gsungs// stong nyid snying rje'i phag mo'i sku// sgrol ma'i sku gsung thugs la 'dud // sgrol ma gsum dang tshul mthun rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu lha mo 'di bsgom bya phyir bshad// dang po rten gyi gang
368b1(rgyud 'grel): zag gis// gdong la sogs pa khrus byas nas// sred du 'ong ba'i gnas de ru// maN+Dal byi dror legs byas la// bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// snying gar zla yi ge tAM// ljags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od 'phros pas// bla ma lta
368b2(rgyud 'grel): mo spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags// rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol// dge ba cung zad ci bsags pa// byang chub thob phyir bdag gis pasngo// de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/
368b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di bzlas pos stong par bsgomya// oM shru n+ya tA dzA nu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kro&haM/ paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng // tAM las rje btsun sbrel ma ni// zhal tsag phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang // g.yas na mchog
368b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin phyag rgya can// g.yon+da na ut+pal sngon po 'dzin// rin chen rgyan rnams mdzes pa'i tshul// skye ba'i seng gos dbu brgyan pa// zhabs gnyis skyil krung phyed pa bzhugs// dar gyi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs/
368b5(rgyud 'grel): blos// de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la// thugs ka'i trAM las 'od 'phos pas// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la// dad pa'i stobs kyis phyag byas te// de nas mchod pa sngags 'dis dbul// oM badz+ra puSh+pe pu
368b6(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe pU dz+re hUM/ oM badz+ra dI pe pA dz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he pA dza hUM/ oM badz+ra nai bi d+ya pU dz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra ar+g+haM pri tIts+tsha pU dza hUM/ oM badz+ra gIN+Do pA dz+re hUM/ ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bsgom// skyon bzlas pa'i da ltar bya/
369a1(rgyud 'grel): oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ sngags phreng snying gnas phyung ste// ye shes thugs la ma nyams pas mchod// byin brlabs tshur 'dus zhal nas thon// bdag lA thim zhing 'od 'phros pas khar
369a2(rgyud 'grel): chod sel dang sgrib sbyangs bsams// des skyo gtor mA gtang bya skye// mi rtog oM las rin chen snod// AHlas bdud rtsi sna tshogs bsam// hUM gis thim zhong sna tshogs gsol// sngags 'dir snying po btags te dbul//
369a3(rgyud 'grel): pa l-i ta pU dza ar+g+haM puM dza bi laM i daM grih+Na kha khaM khA hi khA hi ar+g+haM pr-i tIts+tsha pA dzA khA ti swA hA// dad pa'i stobs kyis bstod par bya// oM stong nyid stong rje phag mo che// sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// smra bsam brjod med
369a4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin// sbrel ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// dri medo ye shes gsol ba'i thugs// sgrol ma'i thugs la phyog 'tshal bstod// zla 'od srid pa'i mun sel baM// 'joms byed nyi ma'i dkyil dang mtshungs//
369a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab yon tan ldan// sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud// 'gro la bu bzhin rtag tu gdung // srid gsum rnam thor 'god// seng sdeng nags la rab gnas shing // 'jigs pa brgyad las shin tu skyog// sgrol
369a6(rgyud 'grel): la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khamasu// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing // skye shi med pa'i chos kyang ston// sgrol me la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams su// ri na
369b1(rgyud 'grel): chen mkha' gro'i skur ston cing // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad rnam sel// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshul bstod// bde ba can gyi zhing khams na// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro skur ston cing // bde ba chen po'i ngang la gnas// sgrol ma la phyag
369b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// rnam par dgra pa'i zhing khams ni// las kyis mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing // phrin las bzhi yi don yang sgrub// sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing khams na// pha rol phyin ma'i skur
369b3(rgyud 'grel): ston cing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshogs dang bcas// sgrol ma le ni phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas nyal ba'i dus na ni// stong pa nyid kyi ngang la nyal// las dang spyod lam ci spyod pa// lha mo'i nga rgyal du ni sgom// 'di brtsams//
369b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi dge ba gang // rje btsun+da sgrol ma'i thugs rje dang // dam pa rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis// rje btsun sgrol ma grub par shog/ rje btsun ka ma la shrIs mdzad pa'o sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
369b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ badz+ra bA rI ha~M swa d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha 'gro ni// 'khor lo'i gtso la rab gtud nas// de yis zab
369b6(rgyud 'grel): mo sgrub pa'i thabs// dra ba sdom pa'i tshul bzhon bshad// de rdo rje phag mo sgrub par 'dod pas dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su bstan bde ba la 'dug la/ kha nub tu bltas te dang por sems bskyed pa sngon
370a1(rgyud 'grel): du song bas dad pas gzhi bzung bsod nams kyis tshogs bsag go/ de nas byin gyis snang ba 'byung ba la bla ma spyi bor bsgoms la/ yi ge gsum gyis chang byin gyis brlab cing /
370a2(rgyud 'grel): oM baM haM yau hriM moM// hriM hrI hUM hUM phaT phaT ces pas lag pa byin gyis brlabs la go bgo ste bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sngags 'di brjod do// oM hr-i g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta~M phaT swA hA/ de nas
370a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang thun mong gri dngos grub 'byung byas lus nga gau yid gsum gyis thabs la mkhas par bya ste/ aM swa b+h+r-i ba shud+d+ha sarba d+hAr+m+ma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM zhes brjod pas lus rnam par+ya dag pa gzha wa ya s+ya
370a4(rgyud 'grel): khang chos 'byung gi kyi la du bsam// oM badz+ra shud+d+ha d+haHs+yArba d+harmaHbadz+ra shud+d+ho&haM zhes brjod pas ngag rnam par rig pa sngags kye 'khor lo l-i// oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI yAM/ oM badz+ra wa r+Na nI ye/ oM
370a5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra bai ro tsa nI yai hUM hU hUM phaT phaT phaT ces bzlas so// oM yo ga shud+d+ho sarba d+harma yo ga shud+d+ho&haM zhes brjod pas yid rnam par dag pa lha'i sku zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang thaMd pa dang
370a6(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa// sku mdog dmar ba la dur khrod kyi chas kyis brgyan pa zhabs g.yas bskum pa// g.yon dus mtshan ma mnan pa/ gar dgu'i nyams kyis bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o// de'i
370b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang gnas su chu'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas phyag rgya bzhis ye shes kyi lha mo dgu gzhug la sogs pa bya/ de yang rang nyid lta bu gcig spyan drangs la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// sdig pa bshag+sas/

370b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra yo gi ni ka ma ru pa yo gau ni// dz+wa la mu khi nI kha kha khA hi hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod cing rkang pa brgyad kyis bstod// de nAs thabs bla na med pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pas yod med gnyis
370b4(rgyud 'grel): su med pa'i gdam ngag bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// mar gyu ri thugs kyis dpral be'u las// zab mo bcud kyis thigs pa 'byung // skal ldan rin che ni lta bu yi// rdo rje phag mo

371b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI kro d+ha s+yA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal khro bor sgrub pa/ smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan khro bo gshin rje gshad// khro rgyal gtso la rab btud nas// de yi zla ba
371b2(rgyud 'grel): mo sgrub pa'i thabs// rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bri// de la 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ste rang gi snying

371b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bur bsgom// de'i ngang las rang gi reg pa hUM mthing nag rab tu 'bar b.raraM bsgom// de gyur pa las rdo rje khro bo hUM gis mtshan pa bsam// de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'dis 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mthing nag
371b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa/ khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa// mche ba gcig shing skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag g.yas kyis ral dri rdo rje'i yu ba can bzung ga g.yon sdigs mdzub ut+pa las mtshan pa/ gcer bu dur khrod
372a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ yum rdo rje phag mo dang rol zhing ye shes kyi me 'bar ba/ ma he gdan du bting nas las kyi gshin rje 'dul bar bsgom// de'i thugs gnas hUM las 'od 'phros pas de lta bu'i ye shes
372a2(rgyud 'grel): mas dpa' spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pa dbul te/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ d+hU pe hAM/ dI pe hUM/ gan+d+he hUM/ ni ri te hUM ni bai d+ya hU~M/ shap+da hUM zhes mchod pa dbul gter mA gtong ngo // gtor snod mi dmigs
372a3(rgyud 'grel): wa las bdud rtsir bsam/ hU~M zhes brjod pas bdud rtsir bsam// 'dod pa'i don tshol gsil ba gdang par bya ste/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH dgug gtsug la sogs pa bya zhing // yi ge gsam gyis sku gsung
372a4(rgyud 'grel): thug ma byin gyis brla ba/ dbang bskur/ mi skyo bar du bsgom/ de nas bzlas pa'i sngags 'di yin/ oM hrIHSh+TaMHbi kr-i ta na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hAhA/ zhes na mkha'i dkyil nas thogs babs
372a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar shin tu drag par bzlas so// de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ zung du 'jug pa/ rdo rje'i bzlas pa sems de la gtad pa'o// nag po thugs kyi dpal be nas// zab mo bdud rtsi'i bcud

372b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis mtshon mar gyur 'gro ba yis// tshe rabs du mar bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun/ dge 'dis drug lnga'i me lce mu yis bcil pa bzhin/ ring min byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob shog ces
372b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po lta bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o// /
